8033 STB_EXTERN void stb_srand(unsigned long seed);
8034 STB_EXTERN unsigned long stb_rand(void);
8035 STB_EXTERN double stb_frand(void);
8036 STB_EXTERN void stb_shuffle(void *p, size_t n, size_t sz,
8037  unsigned long seed);
8038 STB_EXTERN void stb_reverse(void *p, size_t n, size_t sz);
8039 
8040 STB_EXTERN unsigned long stb_randLCG_explicit(unsigned long seed);
8041 
8042 #define stb_rand_define(x,y) \
8043  \
8044  unsigned long x(void) \
8045  { \
8046  static unsigned long stb__rand = y; \
8047  stb__rand = stb__rand * 2147001325 + 715136305; /* BCPL */ \
8048  return 0x31415926 ^ ((stb__rand >> 16) + (stb__rand << 16)); \
8049  }
8050 
8051 #ifdef STB_DEFINE
8052 unsigned long stb_randLCG_explicit(unsigned long seed)
8053 {
8054  return seed * 2147001325 + 715136305;
8055 }
8056 
8057 static unsigned long stb__rand_seed=0;
8058 
8059 unsigned long stb_srandLCG(unsigned long seed)
8060 {
8061  unsigned long previous = stb__rand_seed;
8062  stb__rand_seed = seed;
8063  return previous;
8064 }
8065 
8066 unsigned long stb_randLCG(void)
8067 {
8068  stb__rand_seed = stb__rand_seed * 2147001325 + 715136305; // BCPL generator
8069  // shuffle non-random bits to the middle, and xor to decorrelate with seed
8070  return 0x31415926 ^ ((stb__rand_seed >> 16) + (stb__rand_seed << 16));
8071 }
8072 
8073 double stb_frandLCG(void)
8074 {
8075  return stb_randLCG() / ((double) (1 << 16) * (1 << 16));
8076 }
8077 
8078 void stb_shuffle(void *p, size_t n, size_t sz, unsigned long seed)
8079 {
8080  char *a;
8081  unsigned long old_seed;
8082  int i;
8083  if (seed)
8084  old_seed = stb_srandLCG(seed);
8085  a = (char *) p + (n-1) * sz;
8086 
8087  for (i=n; i > 1; --i) {
8088  int j = stb_randLCG() % i;
8089  stb_swap(a, (char *) p + j * sz, sz);
8090  a -= sz;
8091  }
8092  if (seed)
8093  stb_srandLCG(old_seed);
8094 }
8095 
8096 void stb_reverse(void *p, size_t n, size_t sz)
8097 {
8098  int i,j = n-1;
8099  for (i=0; i < j; ++i,--j) {
8100  stb_swap((char *) p + i * sz, (char *) p + j * sz, sz);
8101  }
8102 }
8103 
8104 // public domain Mersenne Twister by Michael Brundage
8105 #define STB__MT_LEN 624
8106 
8107 int stb__mt_index = STB__MT_LEN*sizeof(unsigned long)+1;
8108 unsigned long stb__mt_buffer[STB__MT_LEN];
8109 
8110 void stb_srand(unsigned long seed)
8111 {
8112  int i;
8113  unsigned long old = stb_srandLCG(seed);
8114  for (i = 0; i < STB__MT_LEN; i++)
8115  stb__mt_buffer[i] = stb_randLCG();
8116  stb_srandLCG(old);
8117  stb__mt_index = STB__MT_LEN*sizeof(unsigned long);
8118 }
8119 
8120 #define STB__MT_IA 397
8121 #define STB__MT_IB (STB__MT_LEN - STB__MT_IA)
8122 #define STB__UPPER_MASK 0x80000000
8123 #define STB__LOWER_MASK 0x7FFFFFFF
8124 #define STB__MATRIX_A 0x9908B0DF
8125 #define STB__TWIST(b,i,j) ((b)[i] & STB__UPPER_MASK) | ((b)[j] & STB__LOWER_MASK)
8126 #define STB__MAGIC(s) (((s)&1)*STB__MATRIX_A)
8127 
8128 unsigned long stb_rand()
8129 {
8130  unsigned long * b = stb__mt_buffer;
8131  int idx = stb__mt_index;
8132  unsigned long s,r;
8133  int i;
8134 
8135  if (idx >= STB__MT_LEN*sizeof(unsigned long)) {
8136  if (idx > STB__MT_LEN*sizeof(unsigned long))
8137  stb_srand(0);
8138  idx = 0;
8139  i = 0;
8140  for (; i < STB__MT_IB; i++) {
8141  s = STB__TWIST(b, i, i+1);
8142  b[i] = b[i + STB__MT_IA] ^ (s >> 1) ^ STB__MAGIC(s);
8143  }
8144  for (; i < STB__MT_LEN-1; i++) {
8145  s = STB__TWIST(b, i, i+1);
8146  b[i] = b[i - STB__MT_IB] ^ (s >> 1) ^ STB__MAGIC(s);
8147  }
8148 
8149  s = STB__TWIST(b, STB__MT_LEN-1, 0);
8150  b[STB__MT_LEN-1] = b[STB__MT_IA-1] ^ (s >> 1) ^ STB__MAGIC(s);
8151  }
8152  stb__mt_index = idx + sizeof(unsigned long);
8153 
8154  r = *(unsigned long *)((unsigned char *)b + idx);
8155 
8156  r ^= (r >> 11);
8157  r ^= (r << 7) & 0x9D2C5680;
8158  r ^= (r << 15) & 0xEFC60000;
8159  r ^= (r >> 18);
8160 
8161  return r;
8162 }
8163 
8164 double stb_frand(void)
8165 {
8166  return stb_rand() / ((double) (1 << 16) * (1 << 16));
8167 }
8168 
8169 #endif
8170 
8171 
8173 //
8174 // stb_dupe
8175 //
8176 // stb_dupe is a duplicate-finding system for very, very large data
8177 // structures--large enough that sorting is too slow, but not so large
8178 // that we can't keep all the data in memory. using it works as follows:
8179 //
8180 // 1. create an stb_dupe:
8181 // provide a hash function
8182 // provide an equality function
8183 // provide an estimate for the size
8184 // optionally provide a comparison function
8185 //
8186 // 2. traverse your data, 'adding' pointers to the stb_dupe
8187 //
8188 // 3. finish and ask for duplicates
8189 //
8190 // the stb_dupe will discard its intermediate data and build
8191 // a collection of sorted lists of duplicates, with non-duplicate
8192 // entries omitted entirely
8193 //
8194 //
8195 // Implementation strategy:
8196 //
8197 // while collecting the N items, we keep a hash table of approximate
8198 // size sqrt(N). (if you tell use the N up front, the hash table is
8199 // just that size exactly)
8200 //
8201 // each entry in the hash table is just an stb__arr of pointers (no need
8202 // to use stb_ps, because we don't need to delete from these)
8203 //
8204 // for step 3, for each entry in the hash table, we apply stb_dupe to it
8205 // recursively. once the size gets small enough (or doesn't decrease
8206 // significantly), we switch to either using qsort() on the comparison
8207 // function, or else we just do the icky N^2 gather
8208 
8209 
8210 typedef struct stb_dupe stb_dupe;
8211 
8212 typedef int (*stb_compare_func)(void *a, void *b);
8213 typedef int (*stb_hash_func)(void *a, unsigned int seed);
8214 
8215 STB_EXTERN void stb_dupe_free(stb_dupe *sd);
8216 STB_EXTERN stb_dupe *stb_dupe_create(stb_hash_func hash,
8217  stb_compare_func eq, int size, stb_compare_func ineq);
8218 STB_EXTERN void stb_dupe_add(stb_dupe *sd, void *item);
8219 STB_EXTERN void stb_dupe_finish(stb_dupe *sd);
8220 STB_EXTERN int stb_dupe_numsets(stb_dupe *sd);
8221 STB_EXTERN void **stb_dupe_set(stb_dupe *sd, int num);
8222 STB_EXTERN int stb_dupe_set_count(stb_dupe *sd, int num);
8223 
8224 struct stb_dupe
8225 {
8226  void ***hash_table;
8227  int hash_size;
8228  int size_log2;
8229  int population;
8230 
8231  int hash_shift;
8232  stb_hash_func hash;
8233 
8234  stb_compare_func eq;
8235  stb_compare_func ineq;
8236 
8237  void ***dupes;
8238 };
8239 
8240 #ifdef STB_DEFINE
8241 
8242 int stb_dupe_numsets(stb_dupe *sd)
8243 {
8244  assert(sd->hash_table == NULL);
8245  return stb_arr_len(sd->dupes);
8246 }
8247 
8248 void **stb_dupe_set(stb_dupe *sd, int num)
8249 {
8250  assert(sd->hash_table == NULL);
8251  return sd->dupes[num];
8252 }
8253 
8254 int stb_dupe_set_count(stb_dupe *sd, int num)
8255 {
8256  assert(sd->hash_table == NULL);
8257  return stb_arr_len(sd->dupes[num]);
8258 }
8259 
8260 stb_dupe *stb_dupe_create(stb_hash_func hash, stb_compare_func eq, int size,
8261  stb_compare_func ineq)
8262 {
8263  int i, hsize;
8264  stb_dupe *sd = (stb_dupe *) malloc(sizeof(*sd));
8265 
8266  sd->size_log2 = 4;
8267  hsize = 1 << sd->size_log2;
8268  while (hsize * hsize < size) {
8269  ++sd->size_log2;
8270  hsize *= 2;
8271  }
8272 
8273  sd->hash = hash;
8274  sd->eq = eq;
8275  sd->ineq = ineq;
8276  sd->hash_shift = 0;
8277 
8278  sd->population = 0;
8279  sd->hash_size = hsize;
8280  sd->hash_table = (void ***) malloc(sizeof(*sd->hash_table) * hsize);
8281  for (i=0; i < hsize; ++i)
8282  sd->hash_table[i] = NULL;
8283 
8284  sd->dupes = NULL;
8285 
8286  return sd;
8287 }
8288 
8289 void stb_dupe_add(stb_dupe *sd, void *item)
8290 {
8291  stb_uint32 hash = sd->hash(item, sd->hash_shift);
8292  int z = hash & (sd->hash_size-1);
8293  stb_arr_push(sd->hash_table[z], item);
8294  ++sd->population;
8295 }
8296 
8297 void stb_dupe_free(stb_dupe *sd)
8298 {
8299  int i;
8300  for (i=0; i < stb_arr_len(sd->dupes); ++i)
8301  if (sd->dupes[i])
8302  stb_arr_free(sd->dupes[i]);
8303  stb_arr_free(sd->dupes);
8304  free(sd);
8305 }
8306 
8307 static stb_compare_func stb__compare;
8308 
8309 static int stb__dupe_compare(const void *a, const void *b)
8310 {
8311  void *p = *(void **) a;
8312  void *q = *(void **) b;
8313 
8314  return stb__compare(p,q);
8315 }
8316 
8317 void stb_dupe_finish(stb_dupe *sd)
8318 {
8319  int i,j,k;
8320  assert(sd->dupes == NULL);
8321  for (i=0; i < sd->hash_size; ++i) {
8322  void ** list = sd->hash_table[i];
8323  if (list != NULL) {
8324  int n = stb_arr_len(list);
8325  // @TODO: measure to find good numbers instead of just making them up!
8326  int thresh = (sd->ineq ? 200 : 20);
8327  // if n is large enough to be worth it, and n is smaller than
8328  // before (so we can guarantee we'll use a smaller hash table);
8329  // and there are enough hash bits left, assuming full 32-bit hash
8330  if (n > thresh && n < (sd->population >> 3) && sd->hash_shift + sd->size_log2*2 < 32) {
8331 
8332  // recursively process this row using stb_dupe, O(N log log N)
8333 
8334  stb_dupe *d = stb_dupe_create(sd->hash, sd->eq, n, sd->ineq);
8335  d->hash_shift = stb_randLCG_explicit(sd->hash_shift);
8336  for (j=0; j < n; ++j)
8337  stb_dupe_add(d, list[j]);
8338  stb_arr_free(sd->hash_table[i]);
8339  stb_dupe_finish(d);
8340  for (j=0; j < stb_arr_len(d->dupes); ++j) {
8341  stb_arr_push(sd->dupes, d->dupes[j]);
8342  d->dupes[j] = NULL; // take over ownership
8343  }
8344  stb_dupe_free(d);
8345 
8346  } else if (sd->ineq) {
8347 
8348  // process this row using qsort(), O(N log N)
8349  stb__compare = sd->ineq;
8350  qsort(list, n, sizeof(list[0]), stb__dupe_compare);
8351 
8352  // find equal subsequences of the list
8353  for (j=0; j < n-1; ) {
8354  // find a subsequence from j..k
8355  for (k=j; k < n; ++k)
8356  // only use ineq so eq can be left undefined
8357  if (sd->ineq(list[j], list[k]))
8358  break;
8359  // k is the first one not in the subsequence
8360  if (k-j > 1) {
8361  void **mylist = NULL;
8362  stb_arr_setlen(mylist, k-j);
8363  memcpy(mylist, list+j, sizeof(list[j]) * (k-j));
8364  stb_arr_push(sd->dupes, mylist);
8365  }
8366  j = k;
8367  }
8368  stb_arr_free(sd->hash_table[i]);
8369  } else {
8370 
8371  // process this row using eq(), O(N^2)
8372  for (j=0; j < n; ++j) {
8373  if (list[j] != NULL) {
8374  void **output = NULL;
8375  for (k=j+1; k < n; ++k) {
8376  if (sd->eq(list[j], list[k])) {
8377  if (output == NULL)
8378  stb_arr_push(output, list[j]);
8379  stb_arr_push(output, list[k]);
8380  list[k] = NULL;
8381  }
8382  }
8383  list[j] = NULL;
8384  if (output)
8385  stb_arr_push(sd->dupes, output);
8386  }
8387  }
8388  stb_arr_free(sd->hash_table[i]);
8389  }
8390  }
8391  }
8392  free(sd->hash_table);
8393  sd->hash_table = NULL;
8394 }
8395 #endif
8396 
8398 //
8399 // templatized Sort routine
8400 //
8401 // This is an attempt to implement a templated sorting algorithm.
8402 // To use it, you have to explicitly instantiate it as a _function_,
8403 // then you call that function. This allows the comparison to be inlined,
8404 // giving the sort similar performance to C++ sorts.
8405 //
8406 // It implements quicksort with three-way-median partitioning (generally
8407 // well-behaved), with a final insertion sort pass.
8408 //
8409 // When you define the compare expression, you should assume you have
8410 // elements of your array pointed to by 'a' and 'b', and perform the comparison
8411 // on those. OR you can use one or more statements; first say '0;', then
8412 // write whatever code you want, and compute the result into a variable 'c'.
8413 
8414 #define stb_declare_sort(FUNCNAME, TYPE) \
8415  void FUNCNAME(TYPE *p, int n)
8416 #define stb_define_sort(FUNCNAME,TYPE,COMPARE) \
8417  stb__define_sort( void, FUNCNAME,TYPE,COMPARE)
8418 #define stb_define_sort_static(FUNCNAME,TYPE,COMPARE) \
8419  stb__define_sort(static void, FUNCNAME,TYPE,COMPARE)
8420 
8421 #define stb__define_sort(MODE, FUNCNAME, TYPE, COMPARE) \
8422  \
8423 static void STB_(FUNCNAME,_ins_sort)(TYPE *p, int n) \
8424 { \
8425  int i,j; \
8426  for (i=1; i < n; ++i) { \
8427  TYPE t = p[i], *a = &t; \
8428  j = i; \
8429  while (j > 0) { \
8430  TYPE *b = &p[j-1]; \
8431  int c = COMPARE; \
8432  if (!c) break; \
8433  p[j] = p[j-1]; \
8434  --j; \
8435  } \
8436  if (i != j) \
8437  p[j] = t; \
8438  } \
8439 } \
8440  \
8441 static void STB_(FUNCNAME,_quicksort)(TYPE *p, int n) \
8442 { \
8443  /* threshhold for transitioning to insertion sort */ \
8444  while (n > 12) { \
8445  TYPE *a,*b,t; \
8446  int c01,c12,c,m,i,j; \
8447  \
8448  /* compute median of three */ \
8449  m = n >> 1; \
8450  a = &p[0]; \
8451  b = &p[m]; \
8452  c = COMPARE; \
8453  c01 = c; \
8454  a = &p[m]; \
8455  b = &p[n-1]; \
8456  c = COMPARE; \
8457  c12 = c; \
8458  /* if 0 >= mid >= end, or 0 < mid < end, then use mid */ \
8459  if (c01 != c12) { \
8460  /* otherwise, we'll need to swap something else to middle */ \
8461  int z; \
8462  a = &p[0]; \
8463  b = &p[n-1]; \
8464  c = COMPARE; \
8465  /* 0>mid && mid<n: 0>n => n; 0<n => 0 */ \
8466  /* 0<mid && mid>n: 0>n => 0; 0<n => n */ \
8467  z = (c == c12) ? 0 : n-1; \
8468  t = p[z]; \
8469  p[z] = p[m]; \
8470  p[m] = t; \
8471  } \
8472  /* now p[m] is the median-of-three */ \
8473  /* swap it to the beginning so it won't move around */ \
8474  t = p[0]; \
8475  p[0] = p[m]; \
8476  p[m] = t; \
8477  \
8478  /* partition loop */ \
8479  i=1; \
8480  j=n-1; \
8481  for(;;) { \
8482  /* handling of equality is crucial here */ \
8483  /* for sentinels & efficiency with duplicates */ \
8484  b = &p[0]; \
8485  for (;;++i) { \
8486  a=&p[i]; \
8487  c = COMPARE; \
8488  if (!c) break; \
8489  } \
8490  a = &p[0]; \
8491  for (;;--j) { \
8492  b=&p[j]; \
8493  c = COMPARE; \
8494  if (!c) break; \
8495  } \
8496  /* make sure we haven't crossed */ \
8497  if (i >= j) break; \
8498  t = p[i]; \
8499  p[i] = p[j]; \
8500  p[j] = t; \
8501  \
8502  ++i; \
8503  --j; \
8504  } \
8505  /* recurse on smaller side, iterate on larger */ \
8506  if (j < (n-i)) { \
8507  STB_(FUNCNAME,_quicksort)(p,j); \
8508  p = p+i; \
8509  n = n-i; \
8510  } else { \
8511  STB_(FUNCNAME,_quicksort)(p+i, n-i); \
8512  n = j; \
8513  } \
8514  } \
8515 } \
8516  \
8517 MODE FUNCNAME(TYPE *p, int n) \
8518 { \
8519  STB_(FUNCNAME, _quicksort)(p, n); \
8520  STB_(FUNCNAME, _ins_sort)(p, n); \
8521 } \
8522 
8523 
8525 //
8526 // stb_bitset an array of booleans indexed by integers
8527 //
8528 
8529 typedef stb_uint32 stb_bitset;
8530 
8531 STB_EXTERN stb_bitset *stb_bitset_new(int value, int len);
8532 
8533 #define stb_bitset_clearall(arr,len) (memset(arr, 0, 4 * (len)))
8534 #define stb_bitset_setall(arr,len) (memset(arr, 255, 4 * (len)))
8535 
8536 #define stb_bitset_setbit(arr,n) ((arr)[(n) >> 5] |= (1 << (n & 31)))
8537 #define stb_bitset_clearbit(arr,n) ((arr)[(n) >> 5] &= ~(1 << (n & 31)))
8538 #define stb_bitset_testbit(arr,n) ((arr)[(n) >> 5] & (1 << (n & 31)))
8539 
8540 STB_EXTERN stb_bitset *stb_bitset_union(stb_bitset *p0, stb_bitset *p1, int len);
8541 
8542 STB_EXTERN int *stb_bitset_getlist(stb_bitset *out, int start, int end);
8543 
8544 STB_EXTERN int stb_bitset_eq(stb_bitset *p0, stb_bitset *p1, int len);
8545 STB_EXTERN int stb_bitset_disjoint(stb_bitset *p0, stb_bitset *p1, int len);
8546 STB_EXTERN int stb_bitset_disjoint_0(stb_bitset *p0, stb_bitset *p1, int len);
8547 STB_EXTERN int stb_bitset_subset(stb_bitset *bigger, stb_bitset *smaller, int len);
8548 STB_EXTERN int stb_bitset_unioneq_changed(stb_bitset *p0, stb_bitset *p1, int len);
8549 
8550 #ifdef STB_DEFINE
8551 int stb_bitset_eq(stb_bitset *p0, stb_bitset *p1, int len)
8552 {
8553  int i;
8554  for (i=0; i < len; ++i)
8555  if (p0[i] != p1[i]) return 0;
8556  return 1;
8557 }
8558 
8559 int stb_bitset_disjoint(stb_bitset *p0, stb_bitset *p1, int len)
8560 {
8561  int i;
8562  for (i=0; i < len; ++i)
8563  if (p0[i] & p1[i]) return 0;
8564  return 1;
8565 }
8566 
8567 int stb_bitset_disjoint_0(stb_bitset *p0, stb_bitset *p1, int len)
8568 {
8569  int i;
8570  for (i=0; i < len; ++i)
8571  if ((p0[i] | p1[i]) != 0xffffffff) return 0;
8572  return 1;
8573 }
8574 
8575 int stb_bitset_subset(stb_bitset *bigger, stb_bitset *smaller, int len)
8576 {
8577  int i;
8578  for (i=0; i < len; ++i)
8579  if ((bigger[i] & smaller[i]) != smaller[i]) return 0;
8580  return 1;
8581 }
8582 
8583 stb_bitset *stb_bitset_union(stb_bitset *p0, stb_bitset *p1, int len)
8584 {
8585  int i;
8586  stb_bitset *d = (stb_bitset *) malloc(sizeof(*d) * len);
8587  for (i=0; i < len; ++i) d[i] = p0[i] | p1[i];
8588  return d;
8589 }
8590 
8591 int stb_bitset_unioneq_changed(stb_bitset *p0, stb_bitset *p1, int len)
8592 {
8593  int i, changed=0;
8594  for (i=0; i < len; ++i) {
8595  stb_bitset d = p0[i] | p1[i];
8596  if (d != p0[i]) {
8597  p0[i] = d;
8598  changed = 1;
8599  }
8600  }
8601  return changed;
8602 }
8603 
8604 stb_bitset *stb_bitset_new(int value, int len)
8605 {
8606  int i;
8607  stb_bitset *d = (stb_bitset *) malloc(sizeof(*d) * len);
8608  if (value) value = 0xffffffff;
8609  for (i=0; i < len; ++i) d[i] = value;
8610  return d;
8611 }
8612 
8613 int *stb_bitset_getlist(stb_bitset *out, int start, int end)
8614 {
8615  int *list = NULL;
8616  int i;
8617  for (i=start; i < end; ++i)
8618  if (stb_bitset_testbit(out, i))
8619  stb_arr_push(list, i);
8620  return list;
8621 }
8622 #endif
8623 
8625 //
8626 // stb_wordwrap quality word-wrapping for fixed-width fonts
8627 //
8628 
8629 STB_EXTERN int stb_wordwrap(int *pairs, int pair_max, int count, char *str);
8630 STB_EXTERN int *stb_wordwrapalloc(int count, char *str);
8631 
8632 #ifdef STB_DEFINE
8633 
8634 int stb_wordwrap(int *pairs, int pair_max, int count, char *str)
8635 {
8636  int n=0,i=0, start=0,nonwhite=0;
8637  if (pairs == NULL) pair_max = 0x7ffffff0;
8638  else pair_max *= 2;
8639  // parse
8640  for(;;) {
8641  int s=i; // first whitespace char; last nonwhite+1
8642  int w; // word start
8643  // accept whitespace
8644  while (isspace(str[i])) {
8645  if (str[i] == '\n' || str[i] == '\r') {
8646  if (str[i] + str[i+1] == '\n' + '\r') ++i;
8647  if (n >= pair_max) return -1;
8648  if (pairs) pairs[n] = start, pairs[n+1] = s-start;
8649  n += 2;
8650  nonwhite=0;
8651  start = i+1;
8652  s = start;
8653  }
8654  ++i;
8655  }
8656  if (i >= start+count) {
8657  // we've gone off the end using whitespace
8658  if (nonwhite) {
8659  if (n >= pair_max) return -1;
8660  if (pairs) pairs[n] = start, pairs[n+1] = s-start;
8661  n += 2;
8662  start = s = i;
8663  nonwhite=0;
8664  } else {
8665  // output all the whitespace
8666  while (i >= start+count) {
8667  if (n >= pair_max) return -1;
8668  if (pairs) pairs[n] = start, pairs[n+1] = count;
8669  n += 2;
8670  start += count;
8671  }
8672  s = start;
8673  }
8674  }
8675 
8676  if (str[i] == 0) break;
8677  // now scan out a word and see if it fits
8678  w = i;
8679  while (str[i] && !isspace(str[i])) {
8680  ++i;
8681  }
8682  // wrapped?
8683  if (i > start + count) {
8684  // huge?
8685  if (i-s <= count) {
8686  if (n >= pair_max) return -1;
8687  if (pairs) pairs[n] = start, pairs[n+1] = s-start;
8688  n += 2;
8689  start = w;
8690  } else {
8691  // This word is longer than one line. If we wrap it onto N lines
8692  // there are leftover chars. do those chars fit on the cur line?
8693  // But if we have leading whitespace, we force it to start here.
8694  if ((w-start) + ((i-w) % count) <= count || !nonwhite) {
8695  // output a full line
8696  if (n >= pair_max) return -1;
8697  if (pairs) pairs[n] = start, pairs[n+1] = count;
8698  n += 2;
8699  start += count;
8700  w = start;
8701  } else {
8702  // output a partial line, trimming trailing whitespace
8703  if (s != start) {
8704  if (n >= pair_max) return -1;
8705  if (pairs) pairs[n] = start, pairs[n+1] = s-start;
8706  n += 2;
8707  start = w;
8708  }
8709  }
8710  // now output full lines as needed
8711  while (start + count <= i) {
8712  if (n >= pair_max) return -1;
8713  if (pairs) pairs[n] = start, pairs[n+1] = count;
8714  n += 2;
8715  start += count;
8716  }
8717  }
8718  }
8719  nonwhite=1;
8720  }
8721  if (start < i) {
8722  if (n >= pair_max) return -1;
8723  if (pairs) pairs[n] = start, pairs[n+1] = i-start;
8724  n += 2;
8725  }
8726  return n>>1;
8727 }
8728 
8729 int *stb_wordwrapalloc(int count, char *str)
8730 {
8731  int n = stb_wordwrap(NULL,0,count,str);
8732  int *z = NULL;
8733  stb_arr_setlen(z, n*2);
8734  stb_wordwrap(z, n, count, str);
8735  return z;
8736 }
8737 #endif
8738 
8739 
8741 //
8742 // stb_match: wildcards and regexping
8743 //
8744 
8745 STB_EXTERN int stb_wildmatch (char *expr, char *candidate);
8746 STB_EXTERN int stb_wildmatchi(char *expr, char *candidate);
8747 STB_EXTERN int stb_wildfind (char *expr, char *candidate);
8748 STB_EXTERN int stb_wildfindi (char *expr, char *candidate);
8749 
8750 STB_EXTERN int stb_regex(char *regex, char *candidate);
8751 
8752 typedef struct stb_matcher stb_matcher;
8753 
8754 STB_EXTERN stb_matcher *stb_regex_matcher(char *regex);
8755 STB_EXTERN int stb_matcher_match(stb_matcher *m, char *str);
8756 STB_EXTERN int stb_matcher_find(stb_matcher *m, char *str);
8757 STB_EXTERN void stb_matcher_free(stb_matcher *f);
8758 
8759 STB_EXTERN stb_matcher *stb_lex_matcher(void);
8760 STB_EXTERN int stb_lex_item(stb_matcher *m, char *str, int result);
8761 STB_EXTERN int stb_lex_item_wild(stb_matcher *matcher, char *regex, int result);
8762 STB_EXTERN int stb_lex(stb_matcher *m, char *str, int *len);
8763 
8764 
8765 
8766 #ifdef STB_DEFINE
8767 
8768 static int stb__match_qstring(char *candidate, char *qstring, int qlen, int insensitive)
8769 {
8770  int i;
8771  if (insensitive) {
8772  for (i=0; i < qlen; ++i)
8773  if (qstring[i] == '?') {
8774  if (!candidate[i]) return 0;
8775  } else
8776  if (tolower(qstring[i]) != tolower(candidate[i]))
8777  return 0;
8778  } else {
8779  for (i=0; i < qlen; ++i)
8780  if (qstring[i] == '?') {
8781  if (!candidate[i]) return 0;
8782  } else
8783  if (qstring[i] != candidate[i])
8784  return 0;
8785  }
8786  return 1;
8787 }
8788 
8789 static int stb__find_qstring(char *candidate, char *qstring, int qlen, int insensitive)
8790 {
8791  char c;
8792 
8793  int offset=0;
8794  while (*qstring == '?') {
8795  ++qstring;
8796  --qlen;
8797  ++candidate;
8798  if (qlen == 0) return 0;
8799  if (*candidate == 0) return -1;
8800  }
8801 
8802  c = *qstring++;
8803  --qlen;
8804  if (insensitive) c = tolower(c);
8805 
8806  while (candidate[offset]) {
8807  if (c == (insensitive ? tolower(candidate[offset]) : candidate[offset]))
8808  if (stb__match_qstring(candidate+offset+1, qstring, qlen, insensitive))
8809  return offset;
8810  ++offset;
8811  }
8812 
8813  return -1;
8814 }
8815 
8816 int stb__wildmatch_raw2(char *expr, char *candidate, int search, int insensitive)
8817 {
8818  int where=0;
8819  int start = -1;
8820 
8821  if (!search) {
8822  // parse to first '*'
8823  if (*expr != '*')
8824  start = 0;
8825  while (*expr != '*') {
8826  if (!*expr)
8827  return *candidate == 0 ? 0 : -1;
8828  if (*expr == '?') {
8829  if (!*candidate) return -1;
8830  } else {
8831  if (insensitive) {
8832  if (tolower(*candidate) != tolower(*expr))
8833  return -1;
8834  } else
8835  if (*candidate != *expr)
8836  return -1;
8837  }
8838  ++candidate, ++expr, ++where;
8839  }
8840  } else {
8841  // 0-length search string
8842  if (!*expr)
8843  return 0;
8844  }
8845 
8846  assert(search || *expr == '*');
8847  if (!search)
8848  ++expr;
8849 
8850  // implicit '*' at this point
8851 
8852  while (*expr) {
8853  int o=0;
8854  // combine redundant * characters
8855  while (expr[0] == '*') ++expr;
8856 
8857  // ok, at this point, expr[-1] == '*',
8858  // and expr[0] != '*'
8859 
8860  if (!expr[0]) return start >= 0 ? start : 0;
8861 
8862  // now find next '*'
8863  o = 0;
8864  while (expr[o] != '*') {
8865  if (expr[o] == 0)
8866  break;
8867  ++o;
8868  }
8869  // if no '*', scan to end, then match at end
8870  if (expr[o] == 0 && !search) {
8871  int z;
8872  for (z=0; z < o; ++z)
8873  if (candidate[z] == 0)
8874  return -1;
8875  while (candidate[z])
8876  ++z;
8877  // ok, now check if they match
8878  if (stb__match_qstring(candidate+z-o, expr, o, insensitive))
8879  return start >= 0 ? start : 0;
8880  return -1;
8881  } else {
8882  // if yes '*', then do stb__find_qmatch on the intervening chars
8883  int n = stb__find_qstring(candidate, expr, o, insensitive);
8884  if (n < 0)
8885  return -1;
8886  if (start < 0)
8887  start = where + n;
8888  expr += o;
8889  candidate += n+o;
8890  }
8891 
8892  if (*expr == 0) {
8893  assert(search);
8894  return start;
8895  }
8896 
8897  assert(*expr == '*');
8898  ++expr;
8899  }
8900 
8901  return start >= 0 ? start : 0;
8902 }
8903 
8904 int stb__wildmatch_raw(char *expr, char *candidate, int search, int insensitive)
8905 {
8906  char buffer[256];
8907  // handle multiple search strings
8908  char *s = strchr(expr, ';');
8909  char *last = expr;
8910  while (s) {
8911  int z;
8912  // need to allow for non-writeable strings... assume they're small
8913  if (s - last < 256) {
8914  stb_strncpy(buffer, last, s-last+1);
8915  z = stb__wildmatch_raw2(buffer, candidate, search, insensitive);
8916  } else {
8917  *s = 0;
8918  z = stb__wildmatch_raw2(last, candidate, search, insensitive);
8919  *s = ';';
8920  }
8921  if (z >= 0) return z;
8922  last = s+1;
8923  s = strchr(last, ';');
8924  }
8925  return stb__wildmatch_raw2(last, candidate, search, insensitive);
8926 }
8927 
8928 int stb_wildmatch(char *expr, char *candidate)
8929 {
8930  return stb__wildmatch_raw(expr, candidate, 0,0) >= 0;
8931 }
8932 
8933 int stb_wildmatchi(char *expr, char *candidate)
8934 {
8935  return stb__wildmatch_raw(expr, candidate, 0,1) >= 0;
8936 }
8937 
8938 int stb_wildfind(char *expr, char *candidate)
8939 {
8940  return stb__wildmatch_raw(expr, candidate, 1,0);
8941 }
8942 
8943 int stb_wildfindi(char *expr, char *candidate)
8944 {
8945  return stb__wildmatch_raw(expr, candidate, 1,1);
8946 }
8947 
8948 typedef struct
8949 {
8950  stb_int16 transition[256];
8951 } stb_dfa;
8952 
8953 // an NFA node represents a state you're in; it then has
8954 // an arbitrary number of edges dangling off of it
8955 // note this isn't utf8-y
8956 typedef struct
8957 {
8958  stb_int16 match; // character/set to match
8959  stb_uint16 node; // output node to go to
8960 } stb_nfa_edge;
8961 
8962 typedef struct
8963 {
8964  stb_int16 goal; // does reaching this win the prize?
8965  stb_uint8 active; // is this in the active list
8966  stb_nfa_edge *out;
8967  stb_uint16 *eps; // list of epsilon closures
8968 } stb_nfa_node;
8969 
8970 #define STB__DFA_UNDEF -1
8971 #define STB__DFA_GOAL -2
8972 #define STB__DFA_END -3
8973 #define STB__DFA_MGOAL -4
8974 #define STB__DFA_VALID 0
8975 
8976 #define STB__NFA_STOP_GOAL -1
8977 
8978 // compiled regexp
8979 struct stb_matcher
8980 {
8981  stb_uint16 start_node;
8982  stb_int16 dfa_start;
8983  stb_uint32 *charset;
8984  int num_charset;
8985  int match_start;
8986  stb_nfa_node *nodes;
8987  int does_lex;
8988 
8989  // dfa matcher
8990  stb_dfa * dfa;
8991  stb_uint32 * dfa_mapping;
8992  stb_int16 * dfa_result;
8993  int num_words_per_dfa;
8994 };
8995 
8996 static int stb__add_node(stb_matcher *matcher)
8997 {
8998  stb_nfa_node z;
8999  z.active = 0;
9000  z.eps = 0;
9001  z.goal = 0;
9002  z.out = 0;
9003  stb_arr_push(matcher->nodes, z);
9004  return stb_arr_len(matcher->nodes)-1;
9005 }
9006 
9007 static void stb__add_epsilon(stb_matcher *matcher, int from, int to)
9008 {
9009  assert(from != to);
9010  if (matcher->nodes[from].eps == NULL)
9011  stb_arr_malloc((void **) &matcher->nodes[from].eps, matcher);
9012  stb_arr_push(matcher->nodes[from].eps, to);
9013 }
9014 
9015 static void stb__add_edge(stb_matcher *matcher, int from, int to, int type)
9016 {
9017  stb_nfa_edge z = { type, to };
9018  if (matcher->nodes[from].out == NULL)
9019  stb_arr_malloc((void **) &matcher->nodes[from].out, matcher);
9020  stb_arr_push(matcher->nodes[from].out, z);
9021 }
9022 
9023 static char *stb__reg_parse_alt(stb_matcher *m, int s, char *r, stb_uint16 *e);
9024 static char *stb__reg_parse(stb_matcher *matcher, int start, char *regex, stb_uint16 *end)
9025 {
9026  int n;
9027  int last_start = -1;
9028  stb_uint16 last_end = start;
9029 
9030  while (*regex) {
9031  switch (*regex) {
9032  case '(':
9033  last_start = last_end;
9034  regex = stb__reg_parse_alt(matcher, last_end, regex+1, &last_end);
9035  if (regex == NULL || *regex != ')')
9036  return NULL;
9037  ++regex;
9038  break;
9039 
9040  case '|':
9041  case ')':
9042  *end = last_end;
9043  return regex;
9044 
9045  case '?':
9046  if (last_start < 0) return NULL;
9047  stb__add_epsilon(matcher, last_start, last_end);
9048  ++regex;
9049  break;
9050 
9051  case '*':
9052  if (last_start < 0) return NULL;
9053  stb__add_epsilon(matcher, last_start, last_end);
9054 
9055  // fall through
9056 
9057  case '+':
9058  if (last_start < 0) return NULL;
9059  stb__add_epsilon(matcher, last_end, last_start);
9060  // prevent links back to last_end from chaining to last_start
9061  n = stb__add_node(matcher);
9062  stb__add_epsilon(matcher, last_end, n);
9063  last_end = n;
9064  ++regex;
9065  break;
9066 
9067  case '{': // not supported!
9068  // @TODO: given {n,m}, clone last_start to last_end m times,
9069  // and include epsilons from start to first m-n blocks
9070  return NULL;
9071 
9072  case '\\':
9073  ++regex;
9074  if (!*regex) return NULL;
9075 
9076  // fallthrough
9077  default: // match exactly this character
9078  n = stb__add_node(matcher);
9079  stb__add_edge(matcher, last_end, n, *regex);
9080  last_start = last_end;
9081  last_end = n;
9082  ++regex;
9083  break;
9084 
9085  case '$':
9086  n = stb__add_node(matcher);
9087  stb__add_edge(matcher, last_end, n, '\n');
9088  last_start = last_end;
9089  last_end = n;
9090  ++regex;
9091  break;
9092 
9093  case '.':
9094  n = stb__add_node(matcher);
9095  stb__add_edge(matcher, last_end, n, -1);
9096  last_start = last_end;
9097  last_end = n;
9098  ++regex;
9099  break;
9100 
9101  case '[': {
9102  stb_uint8 flags[256];
9103  int invert = 0,z;
9104  ++regex;
9105  if (matcher->num_charset == 0) {
9106  matcher->charset = (stb_uint *) stb_malloc(matcher, sizeof(*matcher->charset) * 256);
9107  memset(matcher->charset, 0, sizeof(*matcher->charset) * 256);
9108  }
9109 
9110  memset(flags,0,sizeof(flags));
9111 
9112  // leading ^ is special
9113  if (*regex == '^')
9114  ++regex, invert = 1;
9115 
9116  // leading ] is special
9117  if (*regex == ']') {
9118  flags[']'] = 1;
9119  ++regex;
9120  }
9121  while (*regex != ']') {
9122  stb_uint a;
9123  if (!*regex) return NULL;
9124  a = *regex++;
9125  if (regex[0] == '-' && regex[1] != ']') {
9126  stb_uint i,b = regex[1];
9127  regex += 2;
9128  if (b == 0) return NULL;
9129  if (a > b) return NULL;
9130  for (i=a; i <= b; ++i)
9131  flags[i] = 1;
9132  } else
9133  flags[a] = 1;
9134  }
9135  ++regex;
9136  if (invert) {
9137  int i;
9138  for (i=0; i < 256; ++i)
9139  flags[i] = 1-flags[i];
9140  }
9141 
9142  // now check if any existing charset matches
9143  for (z=0; z < matcher->num_charset; ++z) {
9144  int i, k[2] = { 0, 1 << z};
9145  for (i=0; i < 256; ++i) {
9146  unsigned int f = k[flags[i]];
9147  if ((matcher->charset[i] & k[1]) != f)
9148  break;
9149  }
9150  if (i == 256) break;
9151  }
9152 
9153  if (z == matcher->num_charset) {
9154  int i;
9155  ++matcher->num_charset;
9156  if (matcher->num_charset > 32) {
9157  assert(0); /* NOTREACHED */
9158  return NULL; // too many charsets, oops
9159  }
9160  for (i=0; i < 256; ++i)
9161  if (flags[i])
9162  matcher->charset[i] |= (1 << z);
9163  }
9164 
9165  n = stb__add_node(matcher);
9166  stb__add_edge(matcher, last_end, n, -2 - z);
9167  last_start = last_end;
9168  last_end = n;
9169  break;
9170  }
9171  }
9172  }
9173  *end = last_end;
9174  return regex;
9175 }
9176 
9177 static char *stb__reg_parse_alt(stb_matcher *matcher, int start, char *regex, stb_uint16 *end)
9178 {
9179  stb_uint16 last_end = start;
9180  stb_uint16 main_end;
9181 
9182  int head, tail;
9183 
9184  head = stb__add_node(matcher);
9185  stb__add_epsilon(matcher, start, head);
9186 
9187  regex = stb__reg_parse(matcher, head, regex, &last_end);
9188  if (regex == NULL) return NULL;
9189  if (*regex == 0 || *regex == ')') {
9190  *end = last_end;
9191  return regex;
9192  }
9193 
9194  main_end = last_end;
9195  tail = stb__add_node(matcher);
9196 
9197  stb__add_epsilon(matcher, last_end, tail);
9198 
9199  // start alternatives from the same starting node; use epsilon
9200  // transitions to combine their endings
9201  while(*regex && *regex != ')') {
9202  assert(*regex == '|');
9203  head = stb__add_node(matcher);
9204  stb__add_epsilon(matcher, start, head);
9205  regex = stb__reg_parse(matcher, head, regex+1, &last_end);
9206  if (regex == NULL)
9207  return NULL;
9208  stb__add_epsilon(matcher, last_end, tail);
9209  }
9210 
9211  *end = tail;
9212  return regex;
9213 }
9214 
9215 static char *stb__wild_parse(stb_matcher *matcher, int start, char *str, stb_uint16 *end)
9216 {
9217  int n;
9218  stb_uint16 last_end;
9219 
9220  last_end = stb__add_node(matcher);
9221  stb__add_epsilon(matcher, start, last_end);
9222 
9223  while (*str) {
9224  switch (*str) {
9225  // fallthrough
9226  default: // match exactly this character
9227  n = stb__add_node(matcher);
9228  if (toupper(*str) == tolower(*str)) {
9229  stb__add_edge(matcher, last_end, n, *str);
9230  } else {
9231  stb__add_edge(matcher, last_end, n, tolower(*str));
9232  stb__add_edge(matcher, last_end, n, toupper(*str));
9233  }
9234  last_end = n;
9235  ++str;
9236  break;
9237 
9238  case '?':
9239  n = stb__add_node(matcher);
9240  stb__add_edge(matcher, last_end, n, -1);
9241  last_end = n;
9242  ++str;
9243  break;
9244 
9245  case '*':
9246  n = stb__add_node(matcher);
9247  stb__add_edge(matcher, last_end, n, -1);
9248  stb__add_epsilon(matcher, last_end, n);
9249  stb__add_epsilon(matcher, n, last_end);
9250  last_end = n;
9251  ++str;
9252  break;
9253  }
9254  }
9255 
9256  // now require end of string to match
9257  n = stb__add_node(matcher);
9258  stb__add_edge(matcher, last_end, n, 0);
9259  last_end = n;
9260 
9261  *end = last_end;
9262  return str;
9263 }
9264 
9265 static int stb__opt(stb_matcher *m, int n)
9266 {
9267  for(;;) {
9268  stb_nfa_node *p = &m->nodes[n];
9269  if (p->goal) return n;
9270  if (stb_arr_len(p->out)) return n;
9271  if (stb_arr_len(p->eps) != 1) return n;
9272  n = p->eps[0];
9273  }
9274 }
9275 
9276 static void stb__optimize(stb_matcher *m)
9277 {
9278  // if the target of any edge is a node with exactly
9279  // one out-epsilon, shorten it
9280  int i,j;
9281  for (i=0; i < stb_arr_len(m->nodes); ++i) {
9282  stb_nfa_node *p = &m->nodes[i];
9283  for (j=0; j < stb_arr_len(p->out); ++j)
9284  p->out[j].node = stb__opt(m,p->out[j].node);
9285  for (j=0; j < stb_arr_len(p->eps); ++j)
9286  p->eps[j] = stb__opt(m,p->eps[j] );
9287  }
9288  m->start_node = stb__opt(m,m->start_node);
9289 }
9290 
9291 void stb_matcher_free(stb_matcher *f)
9292 {
9293  stb_free(f);
9294 }
9295 
9296 static stb_matcher *stb__alloc_matcher(void)
9297 {
9298  stb_matcher *matcher = (stb_matcher *) stb_malloc(0,sizeof(*matcher));
9299 
9300  matcher->start_node = 0;
9301  stb_arr_malloc((void **) &matcher->nodes, matcher);
9302  matcher->num_charset = 0;
9303  matcher->match_start = 0;
9304  matcher->does_lex = 0;
9305 
9306  matcher->dfa_start = STB__DFA_UNDEF;
9307  stb_arr_malloc((void **) &matcher->dfa, matcher);
9308  stb_arr_malloc((void **) &matcher->dfa_mapping, matcher);
9309  stb_arr_malloc((void **) &matcher->dfa_result, matcher);
9310 
9311  stb__add_node(matcher);
9312 
9313  return matcher;
9314 }
9315 
9316 static void stb__lex_reset(stb_matcher *matcher)
9317 {
9318  // flush cached dfa data
9319  stb_arr_setlen(matcher->dfa, 0);
9320  stb_arr_setlen(matcher->dfa_mapping, 0);
9321  stb_arr_setlen(matcher->dfa_result, 0);
9322  matcher->dfa_start = STB__DFA_UNDEF;
9323 }
9324 
9325 stb_matcher *stb_regex_matcher(char *regex)
9326 {
9327  char *z;
9328  stb_uint16 end;
9329  stb_matcher *matcher = stb__alloc_matcher();
9330  if (*regex == '^') {
9331  matcher->match_start = 1;
9332  ++regex;
9333  }
9334 
9335  z = stb__reg_parse_alt(matcher, matcher->start_node, regex, &end);
9336 
9337  if (!z || *z) {
9338  stb_free(matcher);
9339  return NULL;
9340  }
9341 
9342  ((matcher->nodes)[(int) end]).goal = STB__NFA_STOP_GOAL;
9343 
9344  return matcher;
9345 }
9346 
9347 stb_matcher *stb_lex_matcher(void)
9348 {
9349  stb_matcher *matcher = stb__alloc_matcher();
9350 
9351  matcher->match_start = 1;
9352  matcher->does_lex = 1;
9353 
9354  return matcher;
9355 }
9356 
9357 int stb_lex_item(stb_matcher *matcher, char *regex, int result)
9358 {
9359  char *z;
9360  stb_uint16 end;
9361 
9362  z = stb__reg_parse_alt(matcher, matcher->start_node, regex, &end);
9363 
9364  if (z == NULL)
9365  return 0;
9366 
9367  stb__lex_reset(matcher);
9368 
9369  matcher->nodes[(int) end].goal = result;
9370  return 1;
9371 }
9372 
9373 int stb_lex_item_wild(stb_matcher *matcher, char *regex, int result)
9374 {
9375  char *z;
9376  stb_uint16 end;
9377 
9378  z = stb__wild_parse(matcher, matcher->start_node, regex, &end);
9379 
9380  if (z == NULL)
9381  return 0;
9382 
9383  stb__lex_reset(matcher);
9384 
9385  matcher->nodes[(int) end].goal = result;
9386  return 1;
9387 }
9388 
9389 static void stb__clear(stb_matcher *m, stb_uint16 *list)
9390 {
9391  int i;
9392  for (i=0; i < stb_arr_len(list); ++i)
9393  m->nodes[(int) list[i]].active = 0;
9394 }
9395 
9396 static int stb__clear_goalcheck(stb_matcher *m, stb_uint16 *list)
9397 {
9398  int i, t=0;
9399  for (i=0; i < stb_arr_len(list); ++i) {
9400  t += m->nodes[(int) list[i]].goal;
9401  m->nodes[(int) list[i]].active = 0;
9402  }
9403  return t;
9404 }
9405 
9406 static stb_uint16 * stb__add_if_inactive(stb_matcher *m, stb_uint16 *list, int n)
9407 {
9408  if (!m->nodes[n].active) {
9409  stb_arr_push(list, n);
9410  m->nodes[n].active = 1;
9411  }
9412  return list;
9413 }
9414 
9415 static stb_uint16 * stb__eps_closure(stb_matcher *m, stb_uint16 *list)
9416 {
9417  int i,n = stb_arr_len(list);
9418 
9419  for(i=0; i < n; ++i) {
9420  stb_uint16 *e = m->nodes[(int) list[i]].eps;
9421  if (e) {
9422  int j,k = stb_arr_len(e);
9423  for (j=0; j < k; ++j)
9424  list = stb__add_if_inactive(m, list, e[j]);
9425  n = stb_arr_len(list);
9426  }
9427  }
9428 
9429  return list;
9430 }
9431 
9432 int stb_matcher_match(stb_matcher *m, char *str)
9433 {
9434  int result = 0;
9435  int i,j,y,z;
9436  stb_uint16 *previous = NULL;
9437  stb_uint16 *current = NULL;
9438  stb_uint16 *temp;
9439 
9440  stb_arr_setsize(previous, 4);
9441  stb_arr_setsize(current, 4);
9442 
9443  previous = stb__add_if_inactive(m, previous, m->start_node);
9444  previous = stb__eps_closure(m,previous);
9445  stb__clear(m, previous);
9446 
9447  while (*str && stb_arr_len(previous)) {
9448  y = stb_arr_len(previous);
9449  for (i=0; i < y; ++i) {
9450  stb_nfa_node *n = &m->nodes[(int) previous[i]];
9451  z = stb_arr_len(n->out);
9452  for (j=0; j < z; ++j) {
9453  if (n->out[j].match >= 0) {
9454  if (n->out[j].match == *str)
9455  current = stb__add_if_inactive(m, current, n->out[j].node);
9456  } else if (n->out[j].match == -1) {
9457  if (*str != '\n')
9458  current = stb__add_if_inactive(m, current, n->out[j].node);
9459  } else if (n->out[j].match < -1) {
9460  int z = -n->out[j].match - 2;
9461  if (m->charset[(stb_uint8) *str] & (1 << z))
9462  current = stb__add_if_inactive(m, current, n->out[j].node);
9463  }
9464  }
9465  }
9466  stb_arr_setlen(previous, 0);
9467 
9468  temp = previous;
9469  previous = current;
9470  current = temp;
9471 
9472  previous = stb__eps_closure(m,previous);
9473  stb__clear(m, previous);
9474 
9475  ++str;
9476  }
9477 
9478  // transition to pick up a '$' at the end
9479  y = stb_arr_len(previous);
9480  for (i=0; i < y; ++i)
9481  m->nodes[(int) previous[i]].active = 1;
9482 
9483  for (i=0; i < y; ++i) {
9484  stb_nfa_node *n = &m->nodes[(int) previous[i]];
9485  z = stb_arr_len(n->out);
9486  for (j=0; j < z; ++j) {
9487  if (n->out[j].match == '\n')
9488  current = stb__add_if_inactive(m, current, n->out[j].node);
9489  }
9490  }
9491 
9492  previous = stb__eps_closure(m,previous);
9493  stb__clear(m, previous);
9494 
9495  y = stb_arr_len(previous);
9496  for (i=0; i < y; ++i)
9497  if (m->nodes[(int) previous[i]].goal)
9498  result = 1;
9499 
9500  stb_arr_free(previous);
9501  stb_arr_free(current);
9502 
9503  return result && *str == 0;
9504 }
9505 
9506 stb_int16 stb__get_dfa_node(stb_matcher *m, stb_uint16 *list)
9507 {
9508  stb_uint16 node;
9509  stb_uint32 data[8], *state, *newstate;
9510  int i,j,n;
9511 
9512  state = (stb_uint32 *) stb_temp(data, m->num_words_per_dfa * 4);
9513  memset(state, 0, m->num_words_per_dfa*4);
9514 
9515  n = stb_arr_len(list);
9516  for (i=0; i < n; ++i) {
9517  int x = list[i];
9518  state[x >> 5] |= 1 << (x & 31);
9519  }
9520 
9521  // @TODO use a hash table
9522  n = stb_arr_len(m->dfa_mapping);
9523  i=j=0;
9524  for(; j < n; ++i, j += m->num_words_per_dfa) {
9525  // @TODO special case for <= 32
9526  if (!memcmp(state, m->dfa_mapping + j, m->num_words_per_dfa*4)) {
9527  node = i;
9528  goto done;
9529  }
9530  }
9531 
9532  assert(stb_arr_len(m->dfa) == i);
9533  node = i;
9534 
9535  newstate = stb_arr_addn(m->dfa_mapping, m->num_words_per_dfa);
9536  memcpy(newstate, state, m->num_words_per_dfa*4);
9537 
9538  // set all transitions to 'unknown'
9539  stb_arr_add(m->dfa);
9540  memset(m->dfa[i].transition, -1, sizeof(m->dfa[i].transition));
9541 
9542  if (m->does_lex) {
9543  int result = -1;
9544  n = stb_arr_len(list);
9545  for (i=0; i < n; ++i) {
9546  if (m->nodes[(int) list[i]].goal > result)
9547  result = m->nodes[(int) list[i]].goal;
9548  }
9549 
9550  stb_arr_push(m->dfa_result, result);
9551  }
9552 
9553 done:
9554  stb_tempfree(data, state);
9555  return node;
9556 }
9557 
9558 static int stb__matcher_dfa(stb_matcher *m, char *str_c, int *len)
9559 {
9560  stb_uint8 *str = (stb_uint8 *) str_c;
9561  stb_int16 node,prevnode;
9562  stb_dfa *trans;
9563  int match_length = 0;
9564  stb_int16 match_result=0;
9565 
9566  if (m->dfa_start == STB__DFA_UNDEF) {
9567  stb_uint16 *list;
9568 
9569  m->num_words_per_dfa = (stb_arr_len(m->nodes)+31) >> 5;
9570  stb__optimize(m);
9571 
9572  list = stb__add_if_inactive(m, NULL, m->start_node);
9573  list = stb__eps_closure(m,list);
9574  if (m->does_lex) {
9575  m->dfa_start = stb__get_dfa_node(m,list);
9576  stb__clear(m, list);
9577  // DON'T allow start state to be a goal state!
9578  // this allows people to specify regexes that can match 0
9579  // characters without them actually matching (also we don't
9580  // check _before_ advancing anyway
9581  if (m->dfa_start <= STB__DFA_MGOAL)
9582  m->dfa_start = -(m->dfa_start - STB__DFA_MGOAL);
9583  } else {
9584  if (stb__clear_goalcheck(m, list))
9585  m->dfa_start = STB__DFA_GOAL;
9586  else
9587  m->dfa_start = stb__get_dfa_node(m,list);
9588  }
9589  stb_arr_free(list);
9590  }
9591 
9592  prevnode = STB__DFA_UNDEF;
9593  node = m->dfa_start;
9594  trans = m->dfa;
9595 
9596  if (m->dfa_start == STB__DFA_GOAL)
9597  return 1;
9598 
9599  for(;;) {
9600  assert(node >= STB__DFA_VALID);
9601 
9602  // fast inner DFA loop; especially if STB__DFA_VALID is 0
9603 
9604  do {
9605  prevnode = node;
9606  node = trans[node].transition[*str++];
9607  } while (node >= STB__DFA_VALID);
9608 
9609  assert(node >= STB__DFA_MGOAL - stb_arr_len(m->dfa));
9610  assert(node < stb_arr_len(m->dfa));
9611 
9612  // special case for lex: need _longest_ match, so notice goal
9613  // state without stopping
9614  if (node <= STB__DFA_MGOAL) {
9615  match_length = str - (stb_uint8 *) str_c;
9616  node = -(node - STB__DFA_MGOAL);
9617  match_result = node;
9618  continue;
9619  }
9620 
9621  // slow NFA->DFA conversion
9622 
9623  // or we hit the goal or the end of the string, but those
9624  // can only happen once per search...
9625 
9626  if (node == STB__DFA_UNDEF) {
9627  // build a list -- @TODO special case <= 32 states
9628  // heck, use a more compact data structure for <= 16 and <= 8 ?!
9629 
9630  // @TODO keep states/newstates around instead of reallocating them
9631  stb_uint16 *states = NULL;
9632  stb_uint16 *newstates = NULL;
9633  int i,j,y,z;
9634  stb_uint32 *flags = &m->dfa_mapping[prevnode * m->num_words_per_dfa];
9635  assert(prevnode != STB__DFA_UNDEF);
9636  stb_arr_setsize(states, 4);
9637  stb_arr_setsize(newstates,4);
9638  for (j=0; j < m->num_words_per_dfa; ++j) {
9639  for (i=0; i < 32; ++i) {
9640  if (*flags & (1 << i))
9641  stb_arr_push(states, j*32+i);
9642  }
9643  ++flags;
9644  }
9645  // states is now the states we were in in the previous node;
9646  // so now we can compute what node it transitions to on str[-1]
9647 
9648  y = stb_arr_len(states);
9649  for (i=0; i < y; ++i) {
9650  stb_nfa_node *n = &m->nodes[(int) states[i]];
9651  z = stb_arr_len(n->out);
9652  for (j=0; j < z; ++j) {
9653  if (n->out[j].match >= 0) {
9654  if (n->out[j].match == str[-1] || (str[-1] == 0 && n->out[j].match == '\n'))
9655  newstates = stb__add_if_inactive(m, newstates, n->out[j].node);
9656  } else if (n->out[j].match == -1) {
9657  if (str[-1] != '\n' && str[-1])
9658  newstates = stb__add_if_inactive(m, newstates, n->out[j].node);
9659  } else if (n->out[j].match < -1) {
9660  int z = -n->out[j].match - 2;
9661  if (m->charset[str[-1]] & (1 << z))
9662  newstates = stb__add_if_inactive(m, newstates, n->out[j].node);
9663  }
9664  }
9665  }
9666  // AND add in the start state!
9667  if (!m->match_start || (str[-1] == '\n' && !m->does_lex))
9668  newstates = stb__add_if_inactive(m, newstates, m->start_node);
9669  // AND epsilon close it
9670  newstates = stb__eps_closure(m, newstates);
9671  // if it's a goal state, then that's all there is to it
9672  if (stb__clear_goalcheck(m, newstates)) {
9673  if (m->does_lex) {
9674  match_length = str - (stb_uint8 *) str_c;
9675  node = stb__get_dfa_node(m,newstates);
9676  match_result = node;
9677  node = -node + STB__DFA_MGOAL;
9678  trans = m->dfa; // could have gotten realloc()ed
9679  } else
9680  node = STB__DFA_GOAL;
9681  } else if (str[-1] == 0 || stb_arr_len(newstates) == 0) {
9682  node = STB__DFA_END;
9683  } else {
9684  node = stb__get_dfa_node(m,newstates);
9685  trans = m->dfa; // could have gotten realloc()ed
9686  }
9687  trans[prevnode].transition[str[-1]] = node;
9688  if (node <= STB__DFA_MGOAL)
9689  node = -(node - STB__DFA_MGOAL);
9690  stb_arr_free(newstates);
9691  stb_arr_free(states);
9692  }
9693 
9694  if (node == STB__DFA_GOAL) {
9695  return 1;
9696  }
9697  if (node == STB__DFA_END) {
9698  if (m->does_lex) {
9699  if (match_result) {
9700  if (len) *len = match_length;
9701  return m->dfa_result[(int) match_result];
9702  }
9703  }
9704  return 0;
9705  }
9706 
9707  assert(node != STB__DFA_UNDEF);
9708  }
9709 }
9710 
9711 int stb_matcher_find(stb_matcher *m, char *str)
9712 {
9713  assert(m->does_lex == 0);
9714  return stb__matcher_dfa(m, str, NULL);
9715 }
9716 
9717 int stb_lex(stb_matcher *m, char *str, int *len)
9718 {
9719  assert(m->does_lex);
9720  return stb__matcher_dfa(m, str, len);
9721 }
9722 
9723 int stb_regex(char *regex, char *str)
9724 {
9725  static stb_perfect p;
9726  static stb_matcher ** matchers;
9727  static char ** regexps;
9728  static char ** regexp_cache;
9729  static unsigned short *mapping;
9730  int z = stb_perfect_hash(&p, (int) regex);
9731  if (z >= 0) {
9732  if (strcmp(regex, regexp_cache[(int) mapping[z]])) {
9733  int i = mapping[z];
9734  stb_matcher_free(matchers[i]);
9735  free(regexp_cache[i]);
9736  regexps[i] = regex;
9737  regexp_cache[i] = _strdup(regex);
9738  matchers[i] = stb_regex_matcher(regex);
9739  }
9740  } else {
9741  int i,n;
9742  if (regex == NULL) {
9743  for (i=0; i < stb_arr_len(matchers); ++i) {
9744  stb_matcher_free(matchers[i]);
9745  free(regexp_cache[i]);
9746  }
9747  stb_arr_free(matchers);
9748  stb_arr_free(regexps);
9749  stb_arr_free(regexp_cache);
9750  stb_perfect_destroy(&p);
9751  free(mapping); mapping = NULL;
9752  return -1;
9753  }
9754  stb_arr_push(regexps, regex);
9755  stb_arr_push(regexp_cache, _strdup(regex));
9756  stb_arr_push(matchers, stb_regex_matcher(regex));
9757  stb_perfect_destroy(&p);
9758  n = stb_perfect_create(&p, (unsigned int *) (char **) regexps, stb_arr_len(regexps));
9759  mapping = (unsigned short *) realloc(mapping, n * sizeof(*mapping));
9760  for (i=0; i < stb_arr_len(regexps); ++i)
9761  mapping[stb_perfect_hash(&p, (int) regexps[i])] = i;
9762  z = stb_perfect_hash(&p, (int) regex);
9763  }
9764  return stb_matcher_find(matchers[(int) mapping[z]], str);
9765 }
9766 
9767 #endif // STB_DEFINE
9768 
9769 
9770 #if 0
9771 //
9773 // C source-code introspection
9774 //
9775 
9776 // runtime structure
9777 typedef struct
9778 {
9779  char *name;
9780  char *type; // base type
9781  char *comment; // content of comment field
9782  int size; // size of base type
9783  int offset; // field offset
9784  int arrcount[8]; // array sizes; -1 = pointer indirection; 0 = end of list
9785 } stb_info_field;
9786 
9787 typedef struct
9788 {
9789  char *structname;
9790  int size;
9791  int num_fields;
9792  stb_info_field *fields;
9793 } stb_info_struct;
9794 
9795 extern stb_info_struct stb_introspect_output[];
9796 
9797 //
9798 
9799 STB_EXTERN void stb_introspect_precompiled(stb_info_struct *compiled);
9800 STB_EXTERN void stb__introspect(char *path, char *file);
9801 
9802 #define stb_introspect_ship() stb__introspect(NULL, NULL, stb__introspect_output)
9803 
9804 #ifdef STB_SHIP
9805 #define stb_introspect() stb_introspect_ship()
9806 #define stb_introspect_path(p) stb_introspect_ship()
9807 #else
9808 // bootstrapping: define stb_introspect() (or 'path') the first time
9809 #define stb_introspect() stb__introspect(NULL, __FILE__, NULL)
9810 #define stb_introspect_auto() stb__introspect(NULL, __FILE__, stb__introspect_output)
9811 
9812 #define stb_introspect_path(p) stb__introspect(p, __FILE__, NULL)
9813 #define stb_introspect_path(p) stb__introspect(p, __FILE__, NULL)
9814 #endif
9815 
9816 #ifdef STB_DEFINE
9817 
9818 #ifndef STB_INTROSPECT_CPP
9819  #ifdef __cplusplus
9820  #define STB_INTROSPECT_CPP 1
9821  #else
9822  #define STB_INTROSPECT_CPP 0
9823  #endif
9824 #endif
9825 
9826 void stb_introspect_precompiled(stb_info_struct *compiled)
9827 {
9828 
9829 }
9830 
9831 
9832 static void stb__introspect_filename(char *buffer, char *path)
9833 {
9834  #if STB_INTROSPECT_CPP
9835  sprintf(buffer, "%s/stb_introspect.cpp", path);
9836  #else
9837  sprintf(buffer, "%s/stb_introspect.c", path);
9838  #endif
9839 }
9840 
9841 static void stb__introspect_compute(char *path, char *file)
9842 {
9843  int i;
9844  char ** include_list = NULL;
9845  char ** introspect_list = NULL;
9846  FILE *f;
9847  f = fopen(file, "w");
9848  if (!f) return;
9849 
9850  fputs("// if you get compiler errors, change the following 0 to a 1:\n", f);
9851  fputs("#define STB_INTROSPECT_INVALID 0\n\n", f);
9852  fputs("// this will force the code to compile, and force the introspector\n", f);
9853  fputs("// to run and then exit, allowing you to recompile\n\n\n", f);
9854  fputs("#include \"stb.h\"\n\n",f );
9855  fputs("#if STB_INTROSPECT_INVALID\n", f);
9856  fputs(" stb_info_struct stb__introspect_output[] = { (void *) 1 }\n", f);
9857  fputs("#else\n\n", f);
9858  for (i=0; i < stb_arr_len(include_list); ++i)
9859  fprintf(f, " #include \"%s\"\n", include_list[i]);
9860 
9861  fputs(" stb_info_struct stb__introspect_output[] =\n{\n", f);
9862  for (i=0; i < stb_arr_len(introspect_list); ++i)
9863  fprintf(f, " stb_introspect_%s,\n", introspect_list[i]);
9864  fputs(" };\n", f);
9865  fputs("#endif\n", f);
9866  fclose(f);
9867 }
9868 
9869 static stb_info_struct *stb__introspect_info;
9870 
9871 #ifndef STB_SHIP
9872 
9873 #endif
9874 
9875 void stb__introspect(char *path, char *file, stb_info_struct *compiled)
9876 {
9877  static int first=1;
9878  if (!first) return;
9879  first=0;
9880 
9881  stb__introspect_info = compiled;
9882 
9883  #ifndef STB_SHIP
9884  if (path || file) {
9885  int bail_flag = compiled && compiled[0].structname == (void *) 1;
9886  int needs_building = bail_flag;
9887  struct stb__stat st;
9888  char buffer[1024], buffer2[1024];
9889  if (!path) {
9890  stb_splitpath(buffer, file, STB_PATH);
9891  path = buffer;
9892  }
9893  // bail if the source path doesn't exist
9894  if (!stb_fexists(path)) return;
9895 
9896  stb__introspect_filename(buffer2, path);
9897 
9898  // get source/include files timestamps, compare to output-file timestamp;
9899  // if mismatched, regenerate
9900 
9901  if (stb__stat(buffer2, &st))
9902  needs_building = STB_TRUE;
9903 
9904  {
9905  // find any file that contains an introspection command and is newer
9906  // if needs_building is already true, we don't need to do this test,
9907  // but we still need these arrays, so go ahead and get them
9908  char **all[3];
9909  all[0] = stb_readdir_files_mask(path, "*.h");
9910  all[1] = stb_readdir_files_mask(path, "*.c");
9911  all[2] = stb_readdir_files_mask(path, "*.cpp");
9912  int i,j;
9913  if (needs_building) {
9914  for (j=0; j < 3; ++j) {
9915  for (i=0; i < stb_arr_len(all[j]); ++i) {
9916  struct stb__stat st2;
9917  if (!stb__stat(all[j][i], &st2)) {
9918  if (st.st_mtime < st2.st_mtime) {
9919  char *z = stb_filec(all[j][i], NULL);
9920  int found=STB_FALSE;
9921  while (y) {
9922  y = strstr(y, "//si");
9923  if (y && isspace(y[4])) {
9924  found = STB_TRUE;
9925  break;
9926  }
9927  }
9928  needs_building = STB_TRUE;
9929  goto done;
9930  }
9931  }
9932  }
9933  }
9934  done:;
9935  }
9936  char *z = stb_filec(all[i], NULL), *y = z;
9937  int found=STB_FALSE;
9938  while (y) {
9939  y = strstr(y, "//si");
9940  if (y && isspace(y[4])) {
9941  found = STB_TRUE;
9942  break;
9943  }
9944  }
9945  if (found)
9946  stb_arr_push(introspect_h, _strdup(all[i]));
9947  free(z);
9948  }
9949  }
9950  stb_readdir_free(all);
9951  if (!needs_building) {
9952  for (i=0; i < stb_arr_len(introspect_h); ++i) {
9953  struct stb__stat st2;
9954  if (!stb__stat(introspect_h[i], &st2))
9955  if (st.st_mtime < st2.st_mtime)
9956  needs_building = STB_TRUE;
9957  }
9958  }
9959 
9960  if (needs_building) {
9961  stb__introspect_compute(path, buffer2);
9962  }
9963  }
9964  }
9965  #endif
9966 }
9967 #endif
9968 #endif
9969 
9970 #ifdef STB_INTROSPECT
9971 // compile-time code-generator
9972 #define INTROSPECT(x) int main(int argc, char **argv) { stb__introspect(__FILE__); return 0; }
9973 #define FILE(x)
9974 
9975 void stb__introspect(char *filename)
9976 {
9977  char *file = stb_file(filename, NULL);
9978  char *s = file, *t, **p;
9979  char *out_name = "stb_introspect.c";
9980  char *out_path;
9981  STB_ARR(char) filelist = NULL;
9982  int i,n;
9983  if (!file) stb_fatal("Couldn't open %s", filename);
9984 
9985  out_path = stb_splitpathdup(filename, STB_PATH);
9986 
9987  // search for the macros
9988  while (*s) {
9989  char buffer[256];
9990  while (*s && !isupper(*s)) ++s;
9991  s = stb_strtok_invert(buffer, s, "ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ");
9992  s = stb_skipwhite(s);
9993  if (*s == '(') {
9994  ++s;
9995  t = strchr(s, ')');
9996  if (t == NULL) stb_fatal("Error parsing %s", filename);
9997 
9998  }
9999  }
10000 }
10001 
10002 
10003 
10004 #endif
10005 
10006 
10008 //
10009 // STB-C sliding-window dictionary compression
10010 //
10011 // This uses a DEFLATE-style sliding window, but no bitwise entropy.
10012 // Everything is on byte boundaries, so you could then apply a byte-wise
10013 // entropy code, though that's nowhere near as effective.
10014 //
10015 // An STB-C stream begins with a 16-byte header:
10016 // 4 bytes: 0x57 0xBC 0x00 0x00
10017 // 8 bytes: big-endian size of decompressed data, 64-bits
10018 // 4 bytes: big-endian size of window (how far back decompressor may need)
10019 //
10020 // The following symbols appear in the stream (these were determined ad hoc,
10021 // not by analysis):
10022 //
10023 // [dict] 00000100 yyyyyyyy yyyyyyyy yyyyyyyy xxxxxxxx xxxxxxxx
10024 // [END] 00000101 11111010 cccccccc cccccccc cccccccc cccccccc
10025 // [dict] 00000110 yyyyyyyy yyyyyyyy yyyyyyyy xxxxxxxx
10026 // [literals] 00000111 zzzzzzzz zzzzzzzz
10027 // [literals] 00001zzz zzzzzzzz
10028 // [dict] 00010yyy yyyyyyyy yyyyyyyy xxxxxxxx xxxxxxxx
10029 // [dict] 00011yyy yyyyyyyy yyyyyyyy xxxxxxxx
10030 // [literals] 001zzzzz
10031 // [dict] 01yyyyyy yyyyyyyy xxxxxxxx
10032 // [dict] 1xxxxxxx yyyyyyyy
10033 //
10034 // xxxxxxxx: match length - 1
10035 // yyyyyyyy: backwards distance - 1
10036 // zzzzzzzz: num literals - 1
10037 // cccccccc: adler32 checksum of decompressed data
10038 // (all big-endian)
10039 
10040 
10041 STB_EXTERN stb_uint stb_decompress_length(stb_uchar *input);
10042 STB_EXTERN stb_uint stb_decompress(stb_uchar *out,stb_uchar *in,stb_uint len);
10043 STB_EXTERN stb_uint stb_compress (stb_uchar *out,stb_uchar *in,stb_uint len);
10044 STB_EXTERN void stb_compress_window(int z);
10045 STB_EXTERN void stb_compress_hashsize(unsigned int z);
10046 
10047 STB_EXTERN int stb_compress_tofile(char *filename, char *in, stb_uint len);
10048 STB_EXTERN int stb_compress_intofile(FILE *f, char *input, stb_uint len);
10049 STB_EXTERN char *stb_decompress_fromfile(char *filename, stb_uint *len);
10050 
10051 STB_EXTERN int stb_compress_stream_start(FILE *f);
10052 STB_EXTERN void stb_compress_stream_end(int close);
10053 STB_EXTERN void stb_write(char *data, int data_len);
10054 
10055 #ifdef STB_DEFINE
10056 
10057 stb_uint stb_decompress_length(stb_uchar *input)
10058 {
10059  return (input[8] << 24) + (input[9] << 16) + (input[10] << 8) + input[11];
10060 }
10061 
10063 
10064 // simple implementation that just writes whole thing into big block
10065 
10066 static unsigned char *stb__barrier;
10067 static unsigned char *stb__barrier2;
10068 static unsigned char *stb__barrier3;
10069 static unsigned char *stb__barrier4;
10070 
10071 static stb_uchar *stb__dout;
10072 static void stb__match(stb_uchar *data, stb_uint length)
10073 {
10074  // INVERSE of memmove... write each byte before copying the next...
10075  assert (stb__dout + length <= stb__barrier);
10076  if (stb__dout + length > stb__barrier) { stb__dout += length; return; }
10077  if (data < stb__barrier4) { stb__dout = stb__barrier+1; return; }
10078  while (length--) *stb__dout++ = *data++;
10079 }
10080 
10081 static void stb__lit(stb_uchar *data, stb_uint length)
10082 {
10083  assert (stb__dout + length <= stb__barrier);
10084  if (stb__dout + length > stb__barrier) { stb__dout += length; return; }
10085  if (data < stb__barrier2) { stb__dout = stb__barrier+1; return; }
10086  memcpy(stb__dout, data, length);
10087  stb__dout += length;
10088 }
10089 
10090 #define stb__in2(x) ((i[x] << 8) + i[(x)+1])
10091 #define stb__in3(x) ((i[x] << 16) + stb__in2((x)+1))
10092 #define stb__in4(x) ((i[x] << 24) + stb__in3((x)+1))
10093 
10094 static stb_uchar *stb_decompress_token(stb_uchar *i)
10095 {
10096  if (*i >= 0x20) { // use fewer if's for cases that expand small
10097  if (*i >= 0x80) stb__match(stb__dout-i[1]-1, i[0] - 0x80 + 1), i += 2;
10098  else if (*i >= 0x40) stb__match(stb__dout-(stb__in2(0) - 0x4000 + 1), i[2]+1), i += 3;
10099  else /* *i >= 0x20 */ stb__lit(i+1, i[0] - 0x20 + 1), i += 1 + (i[0] - 0x20 + 1);
10100  } else { // more ifs for cases that expand large, since overhead is amortized
10101  if (*i >= 0x18) stb__match(stb__dout-(stb__in3(0) - 0x180000 + 1), i[3]+1), i += 4;
10102  else if (*i >= 0x10) stb__match(stb__dout-(stb__in3(0) - 0x100000 + 1), stb__in2(3)+1), i += 5;
10103  else if (*i >= 0x08) stb__lit(i+2, stb__in2(0) - 0x0800 + 1), i += 2 + (stb__in2(0) - 0x0800 + 1);
10104  else if (*i == 0x07) stb__lit(i+3, stb__in2(1) + 1), i += 3 + (stb__in2(1) + 1);
10105  else if (*i == 0x06) stb__match(stb__dout-(stb__in3(1)+1), i[4]+1), i += 5;
10106  else if (*i == 0x04) stb__match(stb__dout-(stb__in3(1)+1), stb__in2(4)+1), i += 6;
10107  }
10108  return i;
10109 }
10110 
10111 stb_uint stb_decompress(stb_uchar *output, stb_uchar *i, stb_uint length)
10112 {
10113  stb_uint olen;
10114  if (stb__in4(0) != 0x57bC0000) return 0;
10115  if (stb__in4(4) != 0) return 0; // error! stream is > 4GB
10116  olen = stb_decompress_length(i);
10117  stb__barrier2 = i;
10118  stb__barrier3 = i+length;
10119  stb__barrier = output + olen;
10120  stb__barrier4 = output;
10121  i += 16;
10122 
10123  stb__dout = output;
10124  while (1) {
10125  stb_uchar *old_i = i;
10126  i = stb_decompress_token(i);
10127  if (i == old_i) {
10128  if (*i == 0x05 && i[1] == 0xfa) {
10129  assert(stb__dout == output + olen);
10130  if (stb__dout != output + olen) return 0;
10131  if (stb_adler32(1, output, olen) != (stb_uint) stb__in4(2))
10132  return 0;
10133  return olen;
10134  } else {
10135  assert(0); /* NOTREACHED */
10136  return 0;
10137  }
10138  }
10139  assert(stb__dout <= output + olen);
10140  if (stb__dout > output + olen)
10141  return 0;
10142  }
10143 }
10144 
10145 char *stb_decompress_fromfile(char *filename, unsigned int *len)
10146 {
10147  unsigned int n;
10148  char *q;
10149  unsigned char *p;
10150  FILE *f = fopen(filename, "rb"); if (f == NULL) return NULL;
10151  fseek(f, 0, SEEK_END);
10152  n = ftell(f);
10153  fseek(f, 0, SEEK_SET);
10154  p = (unsigned char * ) malloc(n); if (p == NULL) return NULL;
10155  fread(p, 1, n, f);
10156  fclose(f);
10157  if (p == NULL) return NULL;
10158  if (p[0] != 0x57 || p[1] != 0xBc || p[2] || p[3]) { free(p); return NULL; }
10159  q = (char *) malloc(stb_decompress_length(p)+1);
10160  if (!q) { free(p); return NULL; }
10161  *len = stb_decompress((unsigned char *) q, p, n);
10162  if (*len) q[*len] = 0;
10163  free(p);
10164  return q;
10165 }
10166 
10167 #if 0
10168 // streaming decompressor
10169 
10170 static struct
10171 {
10172  stb__uchar *in_buffer;
10173  stb__uchar *match;
10174 
10175  stb__uint pending_literals;
10176  stb__uint pending_match;
10177 } xx;
10178 
10179 
10180 
10181 static void stb__match(stb_uchar *data, stb_uint length)
10182 {
10183  // INVERSE of memmove... write each byte before copying the next...
10184  assert (stb__dout + length <= stb__barrier);
10185  if (stb__dout + length > stb__barrier) { stb__dout += length; return; }
10186  if (data < stb__barrier2) { stb__dout = stb__barrier+1; return; }
10187  while (length--) *stb__dout++ = *data++;
10188 }
10189 
10190 static void stb__lit(stb_uchar *data, stb_uint length)
10191 {
10192  assert (stb__dout + length <= stb__barrier);
10193  if (stb__dout + length > stb__barrier) { stb__dout += length; return; }
10194  if (data < stb__barrier2) { stb__dout = stb__barrier+1; return; }
10195  memcpy(stb__dout, data, length);
10196  stb__dout += length;
10197 }
10198 
10199 static void sx_match(stb_uchar *data, stb_uint length)
10200 {
10201  xx.match = data;
10202  xx.pending_match = length;
10203 }
10204 
10205 static void sx_lit(stb_uchar *data, stb_uint length)
10206 {
10207  xx.pending_lit = length;
10208 }
10209 
10210 static int stb_decompress_token_state(void)
10211 {
10212  stb__uchar *i = xx.in_buffer;
10213 
10214  if (*i >= 0x20) { // use fewer if's for cases that expand small
10215  if (*i >= 0x80) sx_match(stb__dout-i[1]-1, i[0] - 0x80 + 1), i += 2;
10216  else if (*i >= 0x40) sx_match(stb__dout-(stb__in2(0) - 0x4000 + 1), i[2]+1), i += 3;
10217  else /* *i >= 0x20 */ sx_lit(i+1, i[0] - 0x20 + 1), i += 1;
10218  } else { // more ifs for cases that expand large, since overhead is amortized
10219  if (*i >= 0x18) sx_match(stb__dout-(stb__in3(0) - 0x180000 + 1), i[3]+1), i += 4;
10220  else if (*i >= 0x10) sx_match(stb__dout-(stb__in3(0) - 0x100000 + 1), stb__in2(3)+1), i += 5;
10221  else if (*i >= 0x08) sx_lit(i+2, stb__in2(0) - 0x0800 + 1), i += 2;
10222  else if (*i == 0x07) sx_lit(i+3, stb__in2(1) + 1), i += 3;
10223  else if (*i == 0x06) sx_match(stb__dout-(stb__in3(1)+1), i[4]+1), i += 5;
10224  else if (*i == 0x04) sx_match(stb__dout-(stb__in3(1)+1), stb__in2(4)+1), i += 6;
10225  else return 0;
10226  }
10227  xx.in_buffer = i;
10228  return 1;
10229 }
10230 #endif
10231 
10232 
10233 
10235 
10236 static unsigned int stb_matchlen(stb_uchar *m1, stb_uchar *m2, stb_uint maxlen)
10237 {
10238  stb_uint i;
10239  for (i=0; i < maxlen; ++i)
10240  if (m1[i] != m2[i]) return i;
10241  return i;
10242 }
10243 
10244 // simple implementation that just takes the source data in a big block
10245 
10246 static stb_uchar *stb__out;
10247 static FILE *stb__outfile;
10248 static stb_uint stb__outbytes;
10249 
10250 static void stb__write(unsigned char v)
10251 {
10252  fputc(v, stb__outfile);
10253  ++stb__outbytes;
10254 }
10255 
10256 #define stb_out(v) (stb__out ? *stb__out++ = (stb_uchar) (v) : stb__write((stb_uchar) (v)))
10257 
10258 static void stb_out2(stb_uint v)
10259 {
10260  stb_out(v >> 8);
10261  stb_out(v);
10262 }
10263 
10264 static void stb_out3(stb_uint v) { stb_out(v >> 16); stb_out(v >> 8); stb_out(v); }
10265 static void stb_out4(stb_uint v) { stb_out(v >> 24); stb_out(v >> 16);
10266  stb_out(v >> 8 ); stb_out(v); }
10267 
10268 static void outliterals(stb_uchar *in, int numlit)
10269 {
10270  while (numlit > 65536) {
10271  outliterals(in,65536);
10272  in += 65536;
10273  numlit -= 65536;
10274  }
10275 
10276  if (numlit == 0) ;
10277  else if (numlit <= 32) stb_out (0x000020 + numlit-1);
10278  else if (numlit <= 2048) stb_out2(0x000800 + numlit-1);
10279  else /* numlit <= 65536) */ stb_out3(0x070000 + numlit-1);
10280 
10281  if (stb__out) {
10282  memcpy(stb__out,in,numlit);
10283  stb__out += numlit;
10284  } else
10285  fwrite(in, 1, numlit, stb__outfile);
10286 }
10287 
10288 static int stb__window = 0x40000; // 256K
10289 void stb_compress_window(int z)
10290 {
10291  if (z >= 0x1000000) z = 0x1000000; // limit of implementation
10292  if (z < 0x100) z = 0x100; // insanely small
10293  stb__window = z;
10294 }
10295 
10296 static int stb_not_crap(int best, int dist)
10297 {
10298  return ((best > 2 && dist <= 0x00100)
10299  || (best > 5 && dist <= 0x04000)
10300  || (best > 7 && dist <= 0x80000));
10301 }
10302 
10303 static stb_uint stb__hashsize = 32768;
10304 void stb_compress_hashsize(unsigned int y)
10305 {
10306  unsigned int z = 1024;
10307  while (z < y) z <<= 1;
10308  stb__hashsize = z >> 2; // pass in bytes, store #pointers
10309 }
10310 
10311 // note that you can play with the hashing functions all you
10312 // want without needing to change the decompressor
10313 #define stb__hc(q,h,c) (((h) << 7) + ((h) >> 25) + q[c])
10314 #define stb__hc2(q,h,c,d) (((h) << 14) + ((h) >> 18) + (q[c] << 7) + q[d])
10315 #define stb__hc3(q,c,d,e) ((q[c] << 14) + (q[d] << 7) + q[e])
10316 
10317 static stb_uint32 stb__running_adler;
10318 
10319 static int stb_compress_chunk(stb_uchar *history,
10320  stb_uchar *start,
10321  stb_uchar *end,
10322  int length,
10323  int *pending_literals,
10324  stb_uchar **chash,
10325  stb_uint mask)
10326 {
10327  int window = stb__window;
10328  stb_uint match_max;
10329  stb_uchar *lit_start = start - *pending_literals;
10330  stb_uchar *q = start;
10331 
10332  #define STB__SCRAMBLE(h) (((h) + ((h) >> 16)) & mask)
10333 
10334  // stop short of the end so we don't scan off the end doing
10335  // the hashing; this means we won't compress the last few bytes
10336  // unless they were part of something longer
10337  while (q < start+length && q+12 < end) {
10338  int m;
10339  stb_uint h1,h2,h3,h4, h;
10340  stb_uchar *t;
10341  int best = 2, dist=0;
10342 
10343  if (q+65536 > end)
10344  match_max = end-q;
10345  else
10346  match_max = 65536;
10347 
10348  #define stb__nc(b,d) ((d) <= window && ((b) > 9 || stb_not_crap(b,d)))
10349 
10350  #define STB__TRY(t,p) /* avoid retrying a match we already tried */ \
10351  if (p ? dist != q-t : 1) \
10352  if ((m = stb_matchlen(t, q, match_max)) > best) \
10353  if (stb__nc(m,q-(t))) \
10354  best = m, dist = q - (t)
10355 
10356  // rather than search for all matches, only try 4 candidate locations,
10357  // chosen based on 4 different hash functions of different lengths.
10358  // this strategy is inspired by LZO; hashing is unrolled here using the
10359  // 'hc' macro
10360  h = stb__hc3(q,0, 1, 2); h1 = STB__SCRAMBLE(h);
10361  t = chash[h1]; if (t) STB__TRY(t,0);
10362  h = stb__hc2(q,h, 3, 4); h2 = STB__SCRAMBLE(h);
10363  h = stb__hc2(q,h, 5, 6); t = chash[h2]; if (t) STB__TRY(t,1);
10364  h = stb__hc2(q,h, 7, 8); h3 = STB__SCRAMBLE(h);
10365  h = stb__hc2(q,h, 9,10); t = chash[h3]; if (t) STB__TRY(t,1);
10366  h = stb__hc2(q,h,11,12); h4 = STB__SCRAMBLE(h);
10367  t = chash[h4]; if (t) STB__TRY(t,1);
10368 
10369  // because we use a shared hash table, can only update it
10370  // _after_ we've probed all of them
10371  chash[h1] = chash[h2] = chash[h3] = chash[h4] = q;
10372 
10373  if (best > 2)
10374  assert(dist > 0);
10375 
10376  // see if our best match qualifies
10377  if (best < 3) { // fast path literals
10378  ++q;
10379  } else if (best > 2 && best <= 0x80 && dist <= 0x100) {
10380  outliterals(lit_start, q-lit_start); lit_start = (q += best);
10381  stb_out(0x80 + best-1);
10382  stb_out(dist-1);
10383  } else if (best > 5 && best <= 0x100 && dist <= 0x4000) {
10384  outliterals(lit_start, q-lit_start); lit_start = (q += best);
10385  stb_out2(0x4000 + dist-1);
10386  stb_out(best-1);
10387  } else if (best > 7 && best <= 0x100 && dist <= 0x80000) {
10388  outliterals(lit_start, q-lit_start); lit_start = (q += best);
10389  stb_out3(0x180000 + dist-1);
10390  stb_out(best-1);
10391  } else if (best > 8 && best <= 0x10000 && dist <= 0x80000) {
10392  outliterals(lit_start, q-lit_start); lit_start = (q += best);
10393  stb_out3(0x100000 + dist-1);
10394  stb_out2(best-1);
10395  } else if (best > 9 && dist <= 0x1000000) {
10396  if (best > 65536) best = 65536;
10397  outliterals(lit_start, q-lit_start); lit_start = (q += best);
10398  if (best <= 0x100) {
10399  stb_out(0x06);
10400  stb_out3(dist-1);
10401  stb_out(best-1);
10402  } else {
10403  stb_out(0x04);
10404  stb_out3(dist-1);
10405  stb_out2(best-1);
10406  }
10407  } else { // fallback literals if no match was a balanced tradeoff
10408  ++q;
10409  }
10410  }
10411 
10412  // if we didn't get all the way, add the rest to literals
10413  if (q-start < length)
10414  q = start+length;
10415 
10416  // the literals are everything from lit_start to q
10417  *pending_literals = (q - lit_start);
10418 
10419  stb__running_adler = stb_adler32(stb__running_adler, start, q - start);
10420  return q - start;
10421 }
10422 
10423 static int stb_compress_inner(stb_uchar *input, stb_uint length)
10424 {
10425  int literals = 0;
10426  stb_uint len,i;
10427 
10428  stb_uchar **chash;
10429  chash = (stb_uchar**) malloc(stb__hashsize * sizeof(stb_uchar*));
10430  if (chash == NULL) return 0; // failure
10431  for (i=0; i < stb__hashsize; ++i)
10432  chash[i] = NULL;
10433 
10434  // stream signature
10435  stb_out(0x57); stb_out(0xbc);
10436  stb_out2(0);
10437 
10438  stb_out4(0); // 64-bit length requires 32-bit leading 0
10439  stb_out4(length);
10440  stb_out4(stb__window);
10441 
10442  stb__running_adler = 1;
10443 
10444  len = stb_compress_chunk(input, input, input+length, length, &literals, chash, stb__hashsize-1);
10445  assert(len == length);
10446 
10447  outliterals(input+length - literals, literals);
10448 
10449  free(chash);
10450 
10451  stb_out2(0x05fa); // end opcode
10452 
10453  stb_out4(stb__running_adler);
10454 
10455  return 1; // success
10456 }
10457 
10458 stb_uint stb_compress(stb_uchar *out, stb_uchar *input, stb_uint length)
10459 {
10460  stb__out = out;
10461  stb__outfile = NULL;
10462 
10463  stb_compress_inner(input, length);
10464 
10465  return stb__out - out;
10466 }
10467 
10468 int stb_compress_tofile(char *filename, char *input, unsigned int length)
10469 {
10470  //int maxlen = length + 512 + (length >> 2); // total guess
10471  //char *buffer = (char *) malloc(maxlen);
10472  //int blen = stb_compress((stb_uchar*)buffer, (stb_uchar*)input, length);
10473 
10474  stb__out = NULL;
10475  stb__outfile = fopen(filename, "wb");
10476  if (!stb__outfile) return 0;
10477 
10478  stb__outbytes = 0;
10479 
10480  if (!stb_compress_inner((stb_uchar*)input, length))
10481  return 0;
10482 
10483  fclose(stb__outfile);
10484 
10485  return stb__outbytes;
10486 }
10487 
10488 int stb_compress_intofile(FILE *f, char *input, unsigned int length)
10489 {
10490  //int maxlen = length + 512 + (length >> 2); // total guess
10491  //char *buffer = (char*)malloc(maxlen);
10492  //int blen = stb_compress((stb_uchar*)buffer, (stb_uchar*)input, length);
10493 
10494  stb__out = NULL;
10495  stb__outfile = f;
10496  if (!stb__outfile) return 0;
10497 
10498  stb__outbytes = 0;
10499 
10500  if (!stb_compress_inner((stb_uchar*)input, length))
10501  return 0;
10502 
10503  return stb__outbytes;
10504 }
10505 
10507 
10508 
10509 static size_t stb_out_backpatch_id(void)
10510 {
10511  if (stb__out)
10512  return (size_t) stb__out;
10513  else
10514  return ftell(stb__outfile);
10515 }
10516 
10517 static void stb_out_backpatch(size_t id, stb_uint value)
10518 {
10519  stb_uchar data[4] = { value >> 24, value >> 16, value >> 8, value };
10520  if (stb__out) {
10521  memcpy((void *) id, data, 4);
10522  } else {
10523  stb_uint where = ftell(stb__outfile);
10524  fseek(stb__outfile, id, SEEK_SET);
10525  fwrite(data, 4, 1, stb__outfile);
10526  fseek(stb__outfile, where, SEEK_SET);
10527  }
10528 }
10529 
10530 // ok, the wraparound buffer was a total failure. let's instead
10531 // use a copying-in-place buffer, which lets us share the code.
10532 // This is way less efficient but it'll do for now.
10533 
10534 static struct
10535 {
10536  stb_uchar *buffer;
10537  int size; // physical size of buffer in bytes
10538 
10539  int valid; // amount of valid data in bytes
10540  int start; // bytes of data already output
10541 
10542  int window;
10543  int fsize;
10544 
10545  int pending_literals; // bytes not-quite output but counted in start
10546  int length_id;
10547 
10548  stb_uint total_bytes;
10549 
10550  stb_uchar **chash;
10551  stb_uint hashmask;
10552 } xtb;
10553 
10554 static int stb_compress_streaming_start(void)
10555 {
10556  stb_uint i;
10557  xtb.size = stb__window * 3;
10558  xtb.buffer = (stb_uchar*)malloc(xtb.size);
10559  if (!xtb.buffer) return 0;
10560 
10561  xtb.chash = (stb_uchar**)malloc(sizeof(*xtb.chash) * stb__hashsize);
10562  if (!xtb.chash) {
10563  free(xtb.buffer);
10564  return 0;
10565  }
10566 
10567  for (i=0; i < stb__hashsize; ++i)
10568  xtb.chash[i] = NULL;
10569 
10570  xtb.hashmask = stb__hashsize-1;
10571 
10572  xtb.valid = 0;
10573  xtb.start = 0;
10574  xtb.window = stb__window;
10575  xtb.fsize = stb__window;
10576  xtb.pending_literals = 0;
10577  xtb.total_bytes = 0;
10578 
10579  // stream signature
10580  stb_out(0x57); stb_out(0xbc); stb_out2(0);
10581 
10582  stb_out4(0); // 64-bit length requires 32-bit leading 0
10583 
10584  xtb.length_id = stb_out_backpatch_id();
10585  stb_out4(0); // we don't know the output length yet
10586 
10587  stb_out4(stb__window);
10588 
10589  stb__running_adler = 1;
10590 
10591  return 1;
10592 }
10593 
10594 static int stb_compress_streaming_end(void)
10595 {
10596  // flush out any remaining data
10597  stb_compress_chunk(xtb.buffer, xtb.buffer+xtb.start, xtb.buffer+xtb.valid,
10598  xtb.valid-xtb.start, &xtb.pending_literals, xtb.chash, xtb.hashmask);
10599 
10600  // write out pending literals
10601  outliterals(xtb.buffer + xtb.valid - xtb.pending_literals, xtb.pending_literals);
10602 
10603  stb_out2(0x05fa); // end opcode
10604  stb_out4(stb__running_adler);
10605 
10606  stb_out_backpatch(xtb.length_id, xtb.total_bytes);
10607 
10608  free(xtb.buffer);
10609  free(xtb.chash);
10610  return 1;
10611 }
10612 
10613 void stb_write(char *data, int data_len)
10614 {
10615  stb_uint i;
10616 
10617  // @TODO: fast path for filling the buffer and doing nothing else
10618  // if (xtb.valid + data_len < xtb.size)
10619 
10620  xtb.total_bytes += data_len;
10621 
10622  while (data_len) {
10623  // fill buffer
10624  if (xtb.valid < xtb.size) {
10625  int amt = xtb.size - xtb.valid;
10626  if (data_len < amt) amt = data_len;
10627  memcpy(xtb.buffer + xtb.valid, data, amt);
10628  data_len -= amt;
10629  data += amt;
10630  xtb.valid += amt;
10631  }
10632  if (xtb.valid < xtb.size)
10633  return;
10634 
10635  // at this point, the buffer is full
10636 
10637  // if we can process some data, go for it; make sure
10638  // we leave an 'fsize's worth of data, though
10639  if (xtb.start + xtb.fsize < xtb.valid) {
10640  int amount = (xtb.valid - xtb.fsize) - xtb.start;
10641  int n;
10642  assert(amount > 0);
10643  n = stb_compress_chunk(xtb.buffer, xtb.buffer + xtb.start, xtb.buffer + xtb.valid,
10644  amount, &xtb.pending_literals, xtb.chash, xtb.hashmask);
10645  xtb.start += n;
10646  }
10647 
10648  assert(xtb.start + xtb.fsize >= xtb.valid);
10649  // at this point, our future size is too small, so we
10650  // need to flush some history. we, in fact, flush exactly
10651  // one window's worth of history
10652 
10653  {
10654  int flush = xtb.window;
10655  assert(xtb.start >= flush);
10656  assert(xtb.valid >= flush);
10657 
10658  // if 'pending literals' extends back into the shift region,
10659  // write them out
10660  if (xtb.start - xtb.pending_literals < flush) {
10661  outliterals(xtb.buffer + xtb.start - xtb.pending_literals, xtb.pending_literals);
10662  xtb.pending_literals = 0;
10663  }
10664 
10665  // now shift the window
10666  memmove(xtb.buffer, xtb.buffer + flush, xtb.valid - flush);
10667  xtb.start -= flush;
10668  xtb.valid -= flush;
10669 
10670  for (i=0; i <= xtb.hashmask; ++i)
10671  if (xtb.chash[i] < xtb.buffer + flush)
10672  xtb.chash[i] = NULL;
10673  else
10674  xtb.chash[i] -= flush;
10675  }
10676  // and now that we've made room for more data, go back to the top
10677  }
10678 }
10679 
10680 int stb_compress_stream_start(FILE *f)
10681 {
10682  stb__out = NULL;
10683  stb__outfile = f;
10684 
10685  if (f == NULL)
10686  return 0;
10687 
10688  if (!stb_compress_streaming_start())
10689  return 0;
10690 
10691  return 1;
10692 }
10693 
10694 void stb_compress_stream_end(int close)
10695 {
10696  stb_compress_streaming_end();
10697  if (close && stb__outfile) {
10698  fclose(stb__outfile);
10699  }
10700 }
10701 
10702 #endif // STB_DEFINE
10703 
10705 //
10706 // File abstraction... tired of not having this... we can write
10707 // compressors to be layers over these that auto-close their children.
10708 
10709 
10710 typedef struct stbfile
10711 {
10712  int (*getbyte)(struct stbfile *); // -1 on EOF
10713  unsigned int (*getdata)(struct stbfile *, void *block, unsigned int len);
10714 
10715  int (*putbyte)(struct stbfile *, int byte);
10716  unsigned int (*putdata)(struct stbfile *, void *block, unsigned int len);
10717 
10718  unsigned int (*size)(struct stbfile *);
10719 
10720  unsigned int (*tell)(struct stbfile *);
10721  void (*backpatch)(struct stbfile *, unsigned int tell, void *block, unsigned int len);
10722 
10723  void (*close)(struct stbfile *);
10724 
10725  FILE *f; // file to fread/fwrite
10726  unsigned char *buffer; // input/output buffer
10727  unsigned char *indata, *inend; // input buffer
10728  union {
10729  int various;
10730  void *ptr;
10731  };
10732 } stbfile;
10733 
10734 STB_EXTERN unsigned int stb_getc(stbfile *f); // read
10735 STB_EXTERN int stb_putc(stbfile *f, int ch); // write
10736 STB_EXTERN unsigned int stb_getdata(stbfile *f, void *buffer, unsigned int len); // read
