13210  ST__reset_numbering = STUA_op_last,
13211  ST_white,
13212  ST_id, ST_float, ST_decimal, ST_hex, ST_char,ST_string, ST_number,
13213  // make sure the keywords come _AFTER_ ST_id, so stb_lex prefer them
13214  ST_if, ST_while, ST_for, ST_eq, ST_nil,
13215  ST_then, ST_do, ST_in, ST_ne, ST_true,
13216  ST_else, ST_break, ST_let, ST_and, ST_false,
13217  ST_elseif, ST_continue, ST_into, ST_or, ST_repeat,
13218  ST_end, ST_as, ST_return, ST_var, ST_func,
13219  ST_catch, ST__frame,
13220  ST__max_terminals,
13221 
13222  STU__defaultparm, STU__seq,
13223 };
13224 
13225 static stua_dict * stu__globaldict;
13226  stua_obj stua_globals;
13227 
13228 static enum
13229 {
13230  FLOW_normal, FLOW_continue, FLOW_break, FLOW_return, FLOW_error,
13231 } stu__flow;
13232 
13233 stua_obj stua_error(char *z, ...)
13234 {
13235  stua_obj a;
13236  char temp[4096], *x;
13237  va_list v; va_start(v,z); vsprintf(temp, z, v); va_end(v);
13238  x = _strdup(temp);
13239  a = stua_box(STU___error, x, strlen(x));
13240  stu__flow = FLOW_error;
13241  stu__flow_val = a;
13242  return stua_nil;
13243 }
13244 
13245 double stua_number(stua_obj z)
13246 {
13247  return stu__tag(z) == stu__int_tag ? stu__int(z) : stu__float(z);
13248 }
13249 
13250 stua_obj stua_make_number(double d)
13251 {
13252  double e = floor(d);
13253  if (e == d && e < (1 << 29) && e >= -(1 << 29))
13254  return stu__makeint((int) e);
13255  else
13256  return stua_float((float) d);
13257 }
13258 
13259 stua_obj (*stua_overload)(int op, stua_obj a, stua_obj b, stua_obj c) = NULL;
13260 
13261 static stua_obj stu__op(int op, stua_obj a, stua_obj b, stua_obj c)
13262 {
13263  stua_obj r = STUA_NO_VALUE;
13264  if (op == '+') {
13265  if (stu__checkt(STU___string, a) && stu__checkt(STU___string, b)) {
13266  ;// @TODO: string concatenation
13267  } else if (stu__checkt(STU___function, a) && stu__checkt(STU___dict, b)) {
13268  stu__func *f = (stu__func *) malloc(12);
13269  assert(offsetof(stu__func, code)==12);
13270  f->closure_source = a;
13271  f->f.closure_data = b;
13272  return stu__makeobj(STU___function, f, 16, 1);
13273  }
13274  }
13275  if (stua_overload) r = stua_overload(op,a,b,c);
13276  if (stu__flow != FLOW_error && r == STUA_NO_VALUE)
13277  stua_error("Typecheck for operator %d", op), r=stua_nil;
13278  return r;
13279 }
13280 
13281 #define STU__EVAL2(a,b) \
13282  a = stu__eval(stu__f[n+1]); if (stu__flow) break; stua_pushroot(a); \
13283  b = stu__eval(stu__f[n+2]); stua_poproot(); if (stu__flow) break;
13284 
13285 #define STU__FB(op) \
13286  STU__EVAL2(a,b) \
13287  if (stu__tag(a) == stu__int_tag && stu__tag(b) == stu__int_tag) \
13288  return ((a) op (b)); \
13289  if (stu__number(a) && stu__number(b)) \
13290  return stua_make_number(stua_number(a) op stua_number(b)); \
13291  return stu__op(stu__f[n], a,b, stua_nil)
13292 
13293 #define STU__F(op) \
13294  STU__EVAL2(a,b) \
13295  if (stu__number(a) && stu__number(b)) \
13296  return stua_make_number(stua_number(a) op stua_number(b)); \
13297  return stu__op(stu__f[n], a,b, stua_nil)
13298 
13299 #define STU__I(op) \
13300  STU__EVAL2(a,b) \
13301  if (stu__tag(a) == stu__int_tag && stu__tag(b) == stu__int_tag) \
13302  return stu__makeint(stu__int(a) op stu__int(b)); \
13303  return stu__op(stu__f[n], a,b, stua_nil)
13304 
13305 #define STU__C(op) \
13306  STU__EVAL2(a,b) \
13307  if (stu__number(a) && stu__number(b)) \
13308  return (stua_number(a) op stua_number(b)) ? stua_true : stua_false; \
13309  return stu__op(stu__f[n], a,b, stua_nil)
13310 
13311 #define STU__CE(op) \
13312  STU__EVAL2(a,b) \
13313  return (a op b) ? stua_true : stua_false
13314 
13315 static short *stu__f;
13316 static stua_obj stu__f_obj;
13317 static stua_dict *stu__c;
13318 static stua_obj stu__funceval(stua_obj fo, stua_obj co);
13319 
13320 static int stu__cond(stua_obj x)
13321 {
13322  if (stu__flow) return 0;
13323  if (!stu__checkt(STU___boolean, x))
13324  x = stu__op('!', x, stua_nil, stua_nil);
13325  if (x == stua_true ) return 1;
13326  if (x == stua_false) return 0;
13327  stu__flow = FLOW_error;
13328  return 0;
13329 }
13330 
13331 // had to manually eliminate tailcall recursion for debugging complex stuff
13332 #define TAILCALL(x) n = (x); goto top;
13333 static stua_obj stu__eval(int n)
13334 {
13335 top:
13336  if (stu__flow >= FLOW_return) return stua_nil; // is this needed?
13337  if (n < 0) return stu__const(stu__f)[n];
13338  assert(n != 0 && n != 1);
13339  switch (stu__f[n]) {
13340  stua_obj a,b,c;
13341  case ST_catch: a = stu__eval(stu__f[n+1]);
13342  if (stu__flow == FLOW_error) { a=stu__flow_val; stu__flow = FLOW_normal; }
13343  return a;
13344  case ST_var: b = stu__eval(stu__f[n+2]); if (stu__flow) break;
13345  stu__set(stu__c, stu__const(stu__f)[stu__f[n+1]], b);
13346  return b;
13347  case STU__seq: stu__eval(stu__f[n+1]); if (stu__flow) break;
13348  TAILCALL(stu__f[n+2]);
13349  case ST_if: if (!stu__cond(stu__eval(stu__f[n+1]))) return stua_nil;
13350  TAILCALL(stu__f[n+2]);
13351  case ST_else: a = stu__cond(stu__eval(stu__f[n+1]));
13352  TAILCALL(stu__f[n + 2 + !a]);
13353  #define STU__HANDLE_BREAK \
13354  if (stu__flow >= FLOW_break) { \
13355  if (stu__flow == FLOW_break) { \
13356  a = stu__flow_val; \
13357  stu__flow = FLOW_normal; \
13358  stu__flow_val = stua_nil; \
13359  return a; \
13360  } \
13361  return stua_nil; \
13362  }
13363  case ST_as: stu__eval(stu__f[n+3]);
13364  STU__HANDLE_BREAK
13365  // fallthrough!
13366  case ST_while: a = stua_nil; stua_pushroot(a);
13367  while (stu__cond(stu__eval(stu__f[n+1]))) {
13368  stua_poproot();
13369  a = stu__eval(stu__f[n+2]);
13370  STU__HANDLE_BREAK
13371  stu__flow = FLOW_normal; // clear 'continue' flag
13372  stua_pushroot(a);
13373  if (stu__f[n+3]) stu__eval(stu__f[n+3]);
13374  STU__HANDLE_BREAK
13375  stu__flow = FLOW_normal; // clear 'continue' flag
13376  }
13377  stua_poproot();
13378  return a;
13379  case ST_break: stu__flow = FLOW_break; stu__flow_val = stu__eval(stu__f[n+1]); break;
13380  case ST_continue:stu__flow = FLOW_continue; break;
13381  case ST_return: stu__flow = FLOW_return; stu__flow_val = stu__eval(stu__f[n+1]); break;
13382  case ST__frame: return stu__f_obj;
13383  case '[': STU__EVAL2(a,b);
13384  if (stu__checkt(STU___dict, a))
13385  return stu__get(stu__pd(a), b, stua_nil);
13386  return stu__op(stu__f[n], a, b, stua_nil);
13387  case '=': a = stu__eval(stu__f[n+2]); if (stu__flow) break;
13388  n = stu__f[n+1];
13389  if (stu__f[n] == ST_id) {
13390  if (!stb_idict_update(stu__c, stu__const(stu__f)[stu__f[n+1]], a))
13391  if (!stb_idict_update(stu__globaldict, stu__const(stu__f)[stu__f[n+1]], a))
13392  return stua_error("Assignment to undefined variable");
13393  } else if (stu__f[n] == '[') {
13394  stua_pushroot(a);
13395  b = stu__eval(stu__f[n+1]); if (stu__flow) { stua_poproot(); break; }
13396  stua_pushroot(b);
13397  c = stu__eval(stu__f[n+2]); stua_poproot(); stua_poproot();
13398  if (stu__flow) break;
13399  if (!stu__checkt(STU___dict, b)) return stua_nil;
13400  stu__set(stu__pd(b), c, a);
13401  } else {
13402  return stu__op(stu__f[n], stu__eval(n), a, stua_nil);
13403  }
13404  return a;
13405  case STU__defaultparm:
13406  a = stu__eval(stu__f[n+2]);
13407  stu__flow = FLOW_normal;
13408  if (stb_idict_add(stu__c, stu__const(stu__f)[stu__f[n+1]], a))
13409  stu__size_allocs += 8;
13410  return stua_nil;
13411  case ST_id: a = stu__get(stu__c, stu__const(stu__f)[stu__f[n+1]], STUA_NO_VALUE); // try local variable
13412  return a != STUA_NO_VALUE // else try stu__compile_global_scope variable
13413  ? a : stu__get(stu__globaldict, stu__const(stu__f)[stu__f[n+1]], stua_nil);
13414  case STU__negate:a = stu__eval(stu__f[n+1]); if (stu__flow) break;
13415  return stu__isint(a) ? -a : stu__op(stu__f[n], a, stua_nil, stua_nil);
13416  case '~': a = stu__eval(stu__f[n+1]); if (stu__flow) break;
13417  return stu__isint(a) ? (~a)&~3 : stu__op(stu__f[n], a, stua_nil, stua_nil);
13418  case '!': a = stu__eval(stu__f[n+1]); if (stu__flow) break;
13419  a = stu__cond(a); if (stu__flow) break;
13420  return a ? stua_true : stua_false;
13421  case ST_eq: STU__CE(==); case ST_le: STU__C(<=); case '<': STU__C(<);
13422  case ST_ne: STU__CE(!=); case ST_ge: STU__C(>=); case '>': STU__C(>);
13423  case '+' : STU__FB(+); case '*': STU__F(*); case '&': STU__I(&); case ST_shl: STU__I(<<);
13424  case '-' : STU__FB(-); case '/': STU__F(/); case '|': STU__I(|); case ST_shr: STU__I(>>);
13425  case '%': STU__I(%); case '^': STU__I(^);
13426  case ST_shru: STU__EVAL2(a,b);
13427  if (stu__tag(a) == stu__int_tag && stu__tag(b) == stu__int_tag)
13428  return stu__makeint((unsigned) stu__int(a) >> stu__int(b));
13429  return stu__op(stu__f[n], a,b, stua_nil);
13430  case ST_and: a = stu__eval(stu__f[n+1]); b = stu__cond(a); if (stu__flow) break;
13431  return a ? stu__eval(stu__f[n+2]) : a;
13432  case ST_or : a = stu__eval(stu__f[n+1]); b = stu__cond(a); if (stu__flow) break;
13433  return a ? b : stu__eval(stu__f[n+2]);
13434  case'(':case':': STU__EVAL2(a,b);
13435  if (!stu__checkt(STU___function, a))
13436  return stu__op(stu__f[n], a,b, stua_nil);
13437  if (!stu__checkt(STU___dict, b))
13438  return stua_nil;
13439  if (stu__f[n] == ':')
13440  b = stu__makeobj(STU___dict, stb_idict_copy(stu__pd(b)), stb_idict_memory_usage(stu__pd(b)), 0);
13441  a = stu__funceval(a,b);
13442  return a;
13443  case '{' : {
13444  stua_dict *d;
13445  d = stb_idict_new_size(stu__f[n+1] > 40 ? 64 : 16);
13446  if (d == NULL)
13447  return stua_nil; // breakpoint fodder
13448  c = stu__makeobj(STU___dict, d, 32, 1);
13449  stua_pushroot(c);
13450  a = stu__f[n+1];
13451  for (b=0; b < a; ++b) {
13452  stua_obj x = stua_pushroot(stu__eval(stu__f[n+2 + b*2 + 0]));
13453  stua_obj y = stu__eval(stu__f[n+2 + b*2 + 1]);
13454  stua_poproot();
13455  if (stu__flow) { stua_poproot(); return stua_nil; }
13456  stu__set(d, x, y);
13457  }
13458  stua_poproot();
13459  return c;
13460  }
13461  default: if (stu__f[n] < 0) return stu__const(stu__f)[stu__f[n]];
13462  assert(0); /* NOTREACHED */ // internal error!
13463  }
13464  return stua_nil;
13465 }
13466 
13467 int stb__stua_nesting;
13468 static stua_obj stu__funceval(stua_obj fo, stua_obj co)
13469 {
13470  stu__func *f = stu__pf(fo);
13471  stua_dict *context = stu__pd(co);
13472  int i,j;
13473  stua_obj p;
13474  short *tf = stu__f; // save previous function
13475  stua_dict *tc = stu__c;
13476 
13477  if (stu__flow == FLOW_error) return stua_nil;
13478  assert(stu__flow == FLOW_normal);
13479 
13480  stua_pushroot(fo);
13481  stua_pushroot(co);
13482  stu__consider_gc(stua_nil);
13483 
13484  while ((stb_uint) f->closure_source > 4) {
13485  // add data from closure to context
13486  stua_dict *e = (stua_dict *) stu__pd(f->f.closure_data);
13487  for (i=0; i < e->limit; ++i)
13488  if (e->table[i].k != STB_IEMPTY && e->table[i].k != STB_IDEL)
13489  if (stb_idict_add(context, e->table[i].k, e->table[i].v))
13490  stu__size_allocs += 8;
13491  // use add so if it's already defined, we don't override it; that way
13492  // explicit parameters win over applied ones, and most recent applications
13493  // win over previous ones
13494  f = stu__pf(f->closure_source);
13495  }
13496 
13497  for (j=0, i=0; i < f->num_param; ++i)
13498  // if it doesn't already exist, add it from the numbered parameters
13499  if (stb_idict_add(context, f->param[i], stu__get(context, stu__int(j), stua_nil)))
13500  ++j;
13501 
13502  // @TODO: if (stu__get(context, stu__int(f->num_param+1)) != STUA_NO_VALUE) // error: too many parameters
13503  // @TODO: ditto too few parameters
13504 
13505  if (f->closure_source == 4)
13506  p = f->f.func(context);
13507  else {
13508  stu__f = f->code, stu__c = context;
13509  stu__f_obj = co;
13510  ++stb__stua_nesting;
13511  if (stu__f[1])
13512  p = stu__eval(stu__f[1]);
13513  else
13514  p = stua_nil;
13515  --stb__stua_nesting;
13516  stu__f = tf, stu__c = tc; // restore previous function
13517  if (stu__flow == FLOW_return) {
13518  stu__flow = FLOW_normal;
13519  p = stu__flow_val;
13520  stu__flow_val = stua_nil;
13521  }
13522  }
13523 
13524  stua_poproot();
13525  stua_poproot();
13526 
13527  return p;
13528 }
13529 
13530 // Parser
13531 
13532 static int stu__tok;
13533 static stua_obj stu__tokval;
13534 
13535 static char *stu__curbuf, *stu__bufstart;
13536 
13537 static stb_matcher *stu__lex_matcher;
13538 
13539 static unsigned char stu__prec[ST__max_terminals], stu__end[ST__max_terminals];
13540 
13541 static void stu__nexttoken(void)
13542 {
13543  int len;
13544 
13545 retry:
13546  stu__tok = stb_lex(stu__lex_matcher, stu__curbuf, &len);
13547  if (stu__tok == 0)
13548  return;
13549  switch(stu__tok) {
13550  case ST_white : stu__curbuf += len; goto retry;
13551  case T__none : stu__tok = *stu__curbuf; break;
13552  case ST_string: stu__tokval = make_string(stu__curbuf+1, len-2); break;
13553  case ST_id : stu__tokval = make_string(stu__curbuf, len); break;
13554  case ST_hex : stu__tokval = stu__makeint(strtol(stu__curbuf+2,NULL,16)); stu__tok = ST_number; break;
13555  case ST_decimal: stu__tokval = stu__makeint(strtol(stu__curbuf ,NULL,10)); stu__tok = ST_number; break;
13556  case ST_float : stu__tokval = stua_float((float) atof(stu__curbuf)) ; stu__tok = ST_number; break;
13557  case ST_char : stu__tokval = stu__curbuf[2] == '\\' ? stu__curbuf[3] : stu__curbuf[2];
13558  if (stu__curbuf[3] == 't') stu__tokval = '\t';
13559  if (stu__curbuf[3] == 'n') stu__tokval = '\n';
13560  if (stu__curbuf[3] == 'r') stu__tokval = '\r';
13561  stu__tokval = stu__makeint(stu__tokval);
13562  stu__tok = ST_number;
13563  break;
13564  }
13565  stu__curbuf += len;
13566 }
13567 
13568 static struct { int stu__tok; char *regex; } stu__lexemes[] =
13569 {
13570  ST_white , "([ \t\n\r]|/\\*(.|\n)*\\*/|//[^\r\n]*([\r\n]|$))+",
13571  ST_id , "[_a-zA-Z][_a-zA-Z0-9]*",
13572  ST_hex , "0x[0-9a-fA-F]+",
13573  ST_decimal, "[0-9]+[0-9]*",
13574  ST_float , "[0-9]+\\.?[0-9]*([eE][-+]?[0-9]+)?",
13575  ST_float , "\\.[0-9]+([eE][-+]?[0-9]+)?",
13576  ST_char , "c'(\\\\.|[^\\'])'",
13577  ST_string , "\"(\\\\.|[^\\\"\n\r])*\"",
13578  ST_string , "\'(\\\\.|[^\\\'\n\r])*\'",
13579 
13580  #define stua_key4(a,b,c,d) ST_##a, #a, ST_##b, #b, ST_##c, #c, ST_##d, #d,
13581  stua_key4(if,then,else,elseif) stua_key4(while,do,for,in)
13582  stua_key4(func,var,let,break) stua_key4(nil,true,false,end)
13583  stua_key4(return,continue,as,repeat) stua_key4(_frame,catch,catch,catch)
13584 
13585  ST_shl, "<<", ST_and, "&&", ST_eq, "==", ST_ge, ">=",
13586  ST_shr, ">>", ST_or , "||", ST_ne, "!=", ST_le, "<=",
13587  ST_shru,">>>", ST_into, "=>",
13588  T__none, ".",
13589 };
13590 
13591 typedef struct
13592 {
13593  stua_obj *data; // constants being compiled
13594  short *code; // code being compiled
13595  stua_dict *locals;
13596  short *non_local_refs;
13597 } stu__comp_func;
13598 
13599 static stu__comp_func stu__pfunc;
13600 static stu__comp_func *func_stack = NULL;
13601 static void stu__push_func_comp(void)
13602 {
13603  stb_arr_push(func_stack, stu__pfunc);
13604  stu__pfunc.data = NULL;
13605  stu__pfunc.code = NULL;
13606  stu__pfunc.locals = stb_idict_new_size(16);
13607  stu__pfunc.non_local_refs = NULL;
13608  stb_arr_push(stu__pfunc.code, 0); // number of data items
13609  stb_arr_push(stu__pfunc.code, 1); // starting execution address
13610 }
13611 
13612 static void stu__pop_func_comp(void)
13613 {
13614  stb_arr_free(stu__pfunc.code);
13615  stb_arr_free(stu__pfunc.data);
13616  stb_idict_destroy(stu__pfunc.locals);
13617  stb_arr_free(stu__pfunc.non_local_refs);
13618  stu__pfunc = stb_arr_pop(func_stack);
13619 }
13620 
13621 // if an id is a reference to an outer lexical scope, this
13622 // function returns the "name" of it, and updates the stack
13623 // structures to make sure the names are propogated in.
13624 static int stu__nonlocal_id(stua_obj var_obj)
13625 {
13626  stua_obj dummy, var = var_obj;
13627  int i, n = stb_arr_len(func_stack), j,k;
13628  if (stb_idict_get_flag(stu__pfunc.locals, var, &dummy)) return 0;
13629  for (i=n-1; i > 1; --i) {
13630  if (stb_idict_get_flag(func_stack[i].locals, var, &dummy))
13631  break;
13632  }
13633  if (i <= 1) return 0; // stu__compile_global_scope
13634  j = i; // need to access variable from j'th frame
13635  for (i=0; i < stb_arr_len(stu__pfunc.non_local_refs); ++i)
13636  if (stu__pfunc.non_local_refs[i] == j) return j-n;
13637  stb_arr_push(stu__pfunc.non_local_refs, j-n);
13638  // now make sure all the parents propogate it down
13639  for (k=n-1; k > 1; --k) {
13640  if (j-k >= 0) return j-n; // comes direct from this parent
13641  for(i=0; i < stb_arr_len(func_stack[k].non_local_refs); ++i)
13642  if (func_stack[k].non_local_refs[i] == j-k)
13643  return j-n;
13644  stb_arr_push(func_stack[k].non_local_refs, j-k);
13645  }
13646  assert (k != 1);
13647 
13648  return j-n;
13649 }
13650 
13651 static int stu__off(void) { return stb_arr_len(stu__pfunc.code); }
13652 static void stu__cc(int a)
13653 {
13654  assert(a >= -2000 && a < 5000);
13655  stb_arr_push(stu__pfunc.code, a);
13656 }
13657 static int stu__cc1(int a) { stu__cc(a); return stu__off()-1; }
13658 static int stu__cc2(int a, int b) { stu__cc(a); stu__cc(b); return stu__off()-2; }
13659 static int stu__cc3(int a, int b, int c) {
13660  if (a == '=') assert(c != 0);
13661  stu__cc(a); stu__cc(b); stu__cc(c); return stu__off()-3; }
13662 static int stu__cc4(int a, int b, int c, int d) { stu__cc(a); stu__cc(b); stu__cc(c); stu__cc(d); return stu__off()-4; }
13663 
13664 static int stu__cdv(stua_obj p)
13665 {
13666  int i;
13667  assert(p != STUA_NO_VALUE);
13668  for (i=0; i < stb_arr_len(stu__pfunc.data); ++i)
13669  if (stu__pfunc.data[i] == p)
13670  break;
13671  if (i == stb_arr_len(stu__pfunc.data))
13672  stb_arr_push(stu__pfunc.data, p);
13673  return ~i;
13674 }
13675 
13676 static int stu__cdt(void)
13677 {
13678  int z = stu__cdv(stu__tokval);
13679  stu__nexttoken();
13680  return z;
13681 }
13682 
13683 static int stu__seq(int a, int b)
13684 {
13685  return !a ? b : !b ? a : stu__cc3(STU__seq, a,b);
13686 }
13687 
13688 static char stu__comp_err_str[1024];
13689 static int stu__comp_err_line;
13690 static int stu__err(char *str, ...)
13691 {
13692  va_list v;
13693  char *s = stu__bufstart;
13694  stu__comp_err_line = 1;
13695  while (s < stu__curbuf) {
13696  if (s[0] == '\n' || s[0] == '\r') {
13697  if (s[0]+s[1] == '\n' + '\r') ++s;
13698  ++stu__comp_err_line;
13699  }
13700  ++s;
13701  }
13702  va_start(v, str);
13703  vsprintf(stu__comp_err_str, str, v);
13704  va_end(v);
13705  return 0;
13706 }
13707 
13708 static int stu__accept(int p)
13709 {
13710  if (stu__tok != p) return 0;
13711  stu__nexttoken();
13712  return 1;
13713 }
13714 
13715 static int stu__demand(int p)
13716 {
13717  if (stu__accept(p)) return 1;
13718  return stu__err("Didn't find expected stu__tok");
13719 }
13720 
13721 static int stu__demandv(int p, stua_obj *val)
13722 {
13723  if (stu__tok == p || p==0) {
13724  *val = stu__tokval;
13725  stu__nexttoken();
13726  return 1;
13727  } else
13728  return 0;
13729 }
13730 
13731 static int stu__expr(int p);
13732 int stu__nexpr(int p) { stu__nexttoken(); return stu__expr(p); }
13733 static int stu__statements(int once, int as);
13734 
13735 static int stu__parse_if(void) // parse both ST_if and ST_elseif
13736 {
13737  int b,c,a;
13738  a = stu__nexpr(1); if (!a) return 0;
13739  if (!stu__demand(ST_then)) return stu__err("expecting THEN");
13740  b = stu__statements(0,0); if (!b) return 0;
13741  if (b == 1) b = -1;
13742 
13743  if (stu__tok == ST_elseif) {
13744  return stu__parse_if();
13745  } else if (stu__accept(ST_else)) {
13746  c = stu__statements(0,0); if (!c) return 0;
13747  if (!stu__demand(ST_end)) return stu__err("expecting END after else clause");
13748  return stu__cc4(ST_else, a, b, c);
13749  } else {
13750  if (!stu__demand(ST_end)) return stu__err("expecting END in if statement");
13751  return stu__cc3(ST_if, a, b);
13752  }
13753 }
13754 
13755 int stu__varinit(int z, int in_globals)
13756 {
13757  int a,b;
13758  stu__nexttoken();
13759  while (stu__demandv(ST_id, &b)) {
13760  if (!stb_idict_add(stu__pfunc.locals, b, 1))
13761  if (!in_globals) return stu__err("Redefined variable %s.", stu__pw(b)->ptr);
13762  if (stu__accept('=')) {
13763  a = stu__expr(1); if (!a) return 0;
13764  } else
13765  a = stu__cdv(stua_nil);
13766  z = stu__seq(z, stu__cc3(ST_var, stu__cdv(b), a));
13767  if (!stu__accept(',')) break;
13768  }
13769  return z;
13770 }
13771 
13772 static int stu__compile_unary(int z, int outparm, int require_inparm)
13773 {
13774  int op = stu__tok, a, b;
13775  stu__nexttoken();
13776  if (outparm) {
13777  if (require_inparm || (stu__tok && stu__tok != ST_end && stu__tok != ST_else && stu__tok != ST_elseif && stu__tok !=';')) {
13778  a = stu__expr(1); if (!a) return 0;
13779  } else
13780  a = stu__cdv(stua_nil);
13781  b = stu__cc2(op, a);
13782  } else
13783  b = stu__cc1(op);
13784  return stu__seq(z,b);
13785 }
13786 
13787 static int stu__assign(void)
13788 {
13789  int z;
13790  stu__accept(ST_let);
13791  z = stu__expr(1); if (!z) return 0;
13792  if (stu__accept('=')) {
13793  int y,p = (z >= 0 ? stu__pfunc.code[z] : 0);
13794  if (z < 0 || (p != ST_id && p != '[')) return stu__err("Invalid lvalue in assignment");
13795  y = stu__assign(); if (!y) return 0;
13796  z = stu__cc3('=', z, y);
13797  }
13798  return z;
13799 }
13800 
13801 static int stu__statements(int once, int stop_while)
13802 {
13803  int a,b, c, z=0;
13804  for(;;) {
13805  switch (stu__tok) {
13806  case ST_if : a = stu__parse_if(); if (!a) return 0;
13807  z = stu__seq(z, a);
13808  break;
13809  case ST_while : if (stop_while) return (z ? z:1);
13810  a = stu__nexpr(1); if (!a) return 0;
13811  if (stu__accept(ST_as)) c = stu__statements(0,0); else c = 0;
13812  if (!stu__demand(ST_do)) return stu__err("expecting DO");
13813  b = stu__statements(0,0); if (!b) return 0;
13814  if (!stu__demand(ST_end)) return stu__err("expecting END");
13815  if (b == 1) b = -1;
13816  z = stu__seq(z, stu__cc4(ST_while, a, b, c));
13817  break;
13818  case ST_repeat : stu__nexttoken();
13819  c = stu__statements(0,1); if (!c) return 0;
13820  if (!stu__demand(ST_while)) return stu__err("expecting WHILE");
13821  a = stu__expr(1); if (!a) return 0;
13822  if (!stu__demand(ST_do)) return stu__err("expecting DO");
13823  b = stu__statements(0,0); if (!b) return 0;
13824  if (!stu__demand(ST_end)) return stu__err("expecting END");
13825  if (b == 1) b = -1;
13826  z = stu__seq(z, stu__cc4(ST_as, a, b, c));
13827  break;
13828  case ST_catch : a = stu__nexpr(1); if (!a) return 0;
13829  z = stu__seq(z, stu__cc2(ST_catch, a));
13830  break;
13831  case ST_var : z = stu__varinit(z,0); break;
13832  case ST_return : z = stu__compile_unary(z,1,1); break;
13833  case ST_continue:z = stu__compile_unary(z,0,0); break;
13834  case ST_break : z = stu__compile_unary(z,1,0); break;
13835  case ST_into : if (z == 0 && !once) return stu__err("=> cannot be first statement in block");
13836  a = stu__nexpr(99);
13837  b = (a >= 0? stu__pfunc.code[a] : 0);
13838  if (a < 0 || (b != ST_id && b != '[')) return stu__err("Invalid lvalue on right side of =>");
13839  z = stu__cc3('=', a, z);
13840  break;
13841  default : if (stu__end[stu__tok]) return once ? 0 : (z ? z:1);
13842  a = stu__assign(); if (!a) return 0;
13843  stu__accept(';');
13844  if (stu__tok && !stu__end[stu__tok]) {
13845  if (a < 0)
13846  return stu__err("Constant has no effect");
13847  if (stu__pfunc.code[a] != '(' && stu__pfunc.code[a] != '=')
13848  return stu__err("Expression has no effect");
13849  }
13850  z = stu__seq(z, a);
13851  break;
13852  }
13853  if (!z) return 0;
13854  stu__accept(';');
13855  if (once && stu__tok != ST_into) return z;
13856  }
13857 }
13858 
13859 static int stu__postexpr(int z, int p);
13860 static int stu__dictdef(int end, int *count)
13861 {
13862  int z,n=0,i,flags=0;
13863  short *dict=NULL;
13864  stu__nexttoken();
13865  while (stu__tok != end) {
13866  if (stu__tok == ST_id) {
13867  stua_obj id = stu__tokval;
13868  stu__nexttoken();
13869  if (stu__tok == '=') {
13870  flags |= 1;
13871  stb_arr_push(dict, stu__cdv(id));
13872  z = stu__nexpr(1); if (!z) return 0;
13873  } else {
13874  z = stu__cc2(ST_id, stu__cdv(id));
13875  z = stu__postexpr(z,1); if (!z) return 0;
13876  flags |= 2;
13877  stb_arr_push(dict, stu__cdv(stu__makeint(n++)));
13878  }
13879  } else {
13880  z = stu__expr(1); if (!z) return 0;
13881  flags |= 2;
13882  stb_arr_push(dict, stu__cdv(stu__makeint(n++)));
13883  }
13884  if (end != ')' && flags == 3) { z=stu__err("can't mix initialized and uninitialized defs"); goto done;}
13885  stb_arr_push(dict, z);
13886  if (!stu__accept(',')) break;
13887  }
13888  if (!stu__demand(end))
13889  return stu__err(end == ')' ? "Expecting ) at end of function call"
13890  : "Expecting } at end of dictionary definition");
13891  z = stu__cc2('{', stb_arr_len(dict)/2);
13892  for (i=0; i < stb_arr_len(dict); ++i)
13893  stu__cc(dict[i]);
13894  if (count) *count = n;
13895 done:
13896  stb_arr_free(dict);
13897  return z;
13898 }
13899 
13900 static int stu__comp_id(void)
13901 {
13902  int z,d;
13903  d = stu__nonlocal_id(stu__tokval);
13904  if (d == 0)
13905  return z = stu__cc2(ST_id, stu__cdt());
13906  // access a non-local frame by naming it with the appropriate int
13907  assert(d < 0);
13908  z = stu__cdv(d); // relative frame # is the 'variable' in our local frame
13909  z = stu__cc2(ST_id, z); // now access that dictionary
13910  return stu__cc3('[', z, stu__cdt()); // now access the variable from that dir
13911 }
13912 
13913 static stua_obj stu__funcdef(stua_obj *id, stua_obj *func);
13914 static int stu__expr(int p)
13915 {
13916  int z;
13917  // unary
13918  switch (stu__tok) {
13919  case ST_number: z = stu__cdt(); break;
13920  case ST_string: z = stu__cdt(); break; // @TODO - string concatenation like C
13921  case ST_id : z = stu__comp_id(); break;
13922  case ST__frame: z = stu__cc1(ST__frame); stu__nexttoken(); break;
13923  case ST_func : z = stu__funcdef(NULL,NULL); break;
13924  case ST_if : z = stu__parse_if(); break;
13925  case ST_nil : z = stu__cdv(stua_nil); stu__nexttoken(); break;
13926  case ST_true : z = stu__cdv(stua_true); stu__nexttoken(); break;
13927  case ST_false : z = stu__cdv(stua_false); stu__nexttoken(); break;
13928  case '-' : z = stu__nexpr(99); if (z) z=stu__cc2(STU__negate,z); else return z; break;
13929  case '!' : z = stu__nexpr(99); if (z) z=stu__cc2('!',z); else return z; break;
13930  case '~' : z = stu__nexpr(99); if (z) z=stu__cc2('~',z); else return z; break;
13931  case '{' : z = stu__dictdef('}', NULL); break;
13932  default : return stu__err("Unexpected token");
13933  case '(' : stu__nexttoken(); z = stu__statements(0,0); if (!stu__demand(')')) return stu__err("Expecting )");
13934  }
13935  return stu__postexpr(z,p);
13936 }
13937 
13938 static int stu__postexpr(int z, int p)
13939 {
13940  int q;
13941  // postfix
13942  while (stu__tok == '(' || stu__tok == '[' || stu__tok == '.') {
13943  if (stu__accept('.')) {
13944  // MUST be followed by a plain identifier! use [] for other stuff
13945  if (stu__tok != ST_id) return stu__err("Must follow . with plain name; try [] instead");
13946  z = stu__cc3('[', z, stu__cdv(stu__tokval));
13947  stu__nexttoken();
13948  } else if (stu__accept('[')) {
13949  while (stu__tok != ']') {
13950  int r = stu__expr(1); if (!r) return 0;
13951  z = stu__cc3('[', z, r);
13952  if (!stu__accept(',')) break;
13953  }
13954  if (!stu__demand(']')) return stu__err("Expecting ]");
13955  } else {
13956  int n, p = stu__dictdef(')', &n); if (!p) return 0;
13957  #if 0 // this is incorrect!
13958  if (z > 0 && stu__pfunc.code[z] == ST_id) {
13959  stua_obj q = stu__get(stu__globaldict, stu__pfunc.data[-stu__pfunc.code[z+1]-1], stua_nil);
13960  if (stu__checkt(STU___function, q))
13961  if ((stu__pf(q))->num_param != n)
13962  return stu__err("Incorrect number of parameters");
13963  }
13964  #endif
13965  z = stu__cc3('(', z, p);
13966  }
13967  }
13968  // binop - this implementation taken from lcc
13969  for (q=stu__prec[stu__tok]; q >= p; --q) {
13970  while (stu__prec[stu__tok] == q) {
13971  int o = stu__tok, y = stu__nexpr(p+1); if (!y) return 0;
13972  z = stu__cc3(o,z,y);
13973  }
13974  }
13975  return z;
13976 }
13977 
13978 static stua_obj stu__finish_func(stua_obj *param, int start)
13979 {
13980  int n, size;
13981  stu__func *f = (stu__func *) malloc(sizeof(*f));
13982  f->closure_source = 0;
13983  f->num_param = stb_arr_len(param);
13984  f->param = (int *) stb_copy(param, f->num_param * sizeof(*f->param));
13985  size = stb_arr_storage(stu__pfunc.code) + stb_arr_storage(stu__pfunc.data) + sizeof(*f) + 8;
13986  f->f.store = malloc(stb_arr_storage(stu__pfunc.code) + stb_arr_storage(stu__pfunc.data));
13987  f->code = (short *) ((char *) f->f.store + stb_arr_storage(stu__pfunc.data));
13988  memcpy(f->code, stu__pfunc.code, stb_arr_storage(stu__pfunc.code));
13989  f->code[1] = start;
13990  f->code[0] = stb_arr_len(stu__pfunc.data);
13991  for (n=0; n < f->code[0]; ++n)
13992  ((stua_obj *) f->code)[-1-n] = stu__pfunc.data[n];
13993  return stu__makeobj(STU___function, f, size, 0);
13994 }
13995 
13996 static int stu__funcdef(stua_obj *id, stua_obj *result)
13997 {
13998  int n,z=0,i,q;
13999  stua_obj *param = NULL;
14000  short *nonlocal;
14001  stua_obj v,f=stua_nil;
14002  assert(stu__tok == ST_func);
14003  stu__nexttoken();
14004  if (id) {
14005  if (!stu__demandv(ST_id, id)) return stu__err("Expecting function name");
14006  } else
14007  stu__accept(ST_id);
14008  if (!stu__demand('(')) return stu__err("Expecting ( for function parameter");
14009  stu__push_func_comp();
14010  while (stu__tok != ')') {
14011  if (!stu__demandv(ST_id, &v)) { z=stu__err("Expecting parameter name"); goto done; }
14012  stb_idict_add(stu__pfunc.locals, v, 1);
14013  if (stu__tok == '=') {
14014  n = stu__nexpr(1); if (!n) { z=0; goto done; }
14015  z = stu__seq(z, stu__cc3(STU__defaultparm, stu__cdv(v), n));
14016  } else
14017  stb_arr_push(param, v);
14018  if (!stu__accept(',')) break;
14019  }
14020  if (!stu__demand(')')) { z=stu__err("Expecting ) at end of parameter list"); goto done; }
14021  n = stu__statements(0,0); if (!n) { z=0; goto done; }
14022  if (!stu__demand(ST_end)) { z=stu__err("Expecting END at end of function"); goto done; }
14023  if (n == 1) n = 0;
14024  n = stu__seq(z,n);
14025  f = stu__finish_func(param, n);
14026  if (result) { *result = f; z=1; stu__pop_func_comp(); }
14027  else {
14028  nonlocal = stu__pfunc.non_local_refs;
14029  stu__pfunc.non_local_refs = NULL;
14030  stu__pop_func_comp();
14031  z = stu__cdv(f);
14032  if (nonlocal) { // build a closure with references to the needed frames
14033  short *initcode = NULL;
14034  for (i=0; i < stb_arr_len(nonlocal); ++i) {
14035  int k = nonlocal[i], p;
14036  stb_arr_push(initcode, stu__cdv(k));
14037  if (k == -1) p = stu__cc1(ST__frame);
14038  else { p = stu__cdv(stu__makeint(k+1)); p = stu__cc2(ST_id, p); }
14039  stb_arr_push(initcode, p);
14040  }
14041  q = stu__cc2('{', stb_arr_len(nonlocal));
14042  for (i=0; i < stb_arr_len(initcode); ++i)
14043  stu__cc(initcode[i]);
14044  z = stu__cc3('+', z, q);
14045  stb_arr_free(initcode);
14046  }
14047  stb_arr_free(nonlocal);
14048  }
14049 done:
14050  stb_arr_free(param);
14051  if (!z) stu__pop_func_comp();
14052  return z;
14053 }
14054 
14055 static int stu__compile_global_scope(void)
14056 {
14057  stua_obj o;
14058  int z=0;
14059 
14060  stu__push_func_comp();
14061  while (stu__tok != 0) {
14062  if (stu__tok == ST_func) {
14063  stua_obj id, f;
14064  if (!stu__funcdef(&id,&f))
14065  goto error;
14066  stu__set(stu__globaldict, id, f);
14067  } else if (stu__tok == ST_var) {
14068  z = stu__varinit(z,1); if (!z) goto error;
14069  } else {
14070  int y = stu__statements(1,0); if (!y) goto error;
14071  z = stu__seq(z,y);
14072  }
14073  stu__accept(';');
14074  }
14075  o = stu__finish_func(NULL, z);
14076  stu__pop_func_comp();
14077 
14078  o = stu__funceval(o, stua_globals); // initialize stu__globaldict
14079  if (stu__flow == FLOW_error)
14080  printf("Error: %s\n", ((stu__wrapper *) stu__ptr(stu__flow_val))->ptr);
14081  return 1;
14082 error:
14083  stu__pop_func_comp();
14084  return 0;
14085 }
14086 
14087 stua_obj stu__myprint(stua_dict *context)
14088 {
14089  stua_obj x = stu__get(context, stua_string("x"), stua_nil);
14090  if ((x & 1) == stu__float_tag) printf("%f", stu__getfloat(x));
14091  else if (stu__tag(x) == stu__int_tag) printf("%d", stu__int(x));
14092  else {
14093  stu__wrapper *s = stu__pw(x);
14094  if (s->type == STU___string || s->type == STU___error)
14095  printf("%s", s->ptr);
14096  else if (s->type == STU___dict) printf("{{dictionary}}");
14097  else if (s->type == STU___function) printf("[[function]]");
14098  else
14099  printf("[[ERROR:%s]]", s->ptr);
14100  }
14101  return x;
14102 }
14103 
14104 void stua_init(void)
14105 {
14106  if (!stu__globaldict) {
14107  int i;
14108  stua_obj s;
14109  stu__func *f;
14110 
14111  stu__prec[ST_and] = stu__prec[ST_or] = 1;
14112  stu__prec[ST_eq ] = stu__prec[ST_ne] = stu__prec[ST_le] =
14113  stu__prec[ST_ge] = stu__prec['>' ] = stu__prec['<'] = 2;
14114  stu__prec[':'] = 3;
14115  stu__prec['&'] = stu__prec['|'] = stu__prec['^'] = 4;
14116  stu__prec['+'] = stu__prec['-'] = 5;
14117  stu__prec['*'] = stu__prec['/'] = stu__prec['%'] =
14118  stu__prec[ST_shl]= stu__prec[ST_shr]= stu__prec[ST_shru]= 6;
14119 
14120  stu__end[')'] = stu__end[ST_end] = stu__end[ST_else] = 1;
14121  stu__end[ST_do] = stu__end[ST_elseif] = 1;
14122 
14123  stu__float_init();
14124  stu__lex_matcher = stb_lex_matcher();
14125  for (i=0; i < sizeof(stu__lexemes)/sizeof(stu__lexemes[0]); ++i)
14126  stb_lex_item(stu__lex_matcher, stu__lexemes[i].regex, stu__lexemes[i].stu__tok);
14127 
14128  stu__globaldict = stb_idict_new_size(64);
14129  stua_globals = stu__makeobj(STU___dict, stu__globaldict, 0,0);
14130  stu__strings = stb_sdict_new(0);
14131 
14132  stu__curbuf = stu__bufstart = "func _print(x) end\n"
14133  "func print()\n var x=0 while _frame[x] != nil as x=x+1 do _print(_frame[x]) end end\n";
14134  stu__nexttoken();
14135  if (!stu__compile_global_scope())
14136  printf("Compile error in line %d: %s\n", stu__comp_err_line, stu__comp_err_str);
14137 
14138  s = stu__get(stu__globaldict, stua_string("_print"), stua_nil);
14139  if (stu__tag(s) == stu__ptr_tag && stu__ptr(s)->type == STU___function) {
14140  f = stu__pf(s);
14141  free(f->f.store);
14142  f->closure_source = 4;
14143  f->f.func = stu__myprint;
14144  f->code = NULL;
14145  }
14146  }
14147 }
14148 
14149 void stua_uninit(void)
14150 {
14151  if (stu__globaldict) {
14152  stb_idict_remove_all(stu__globaldict);
14153  stb_arr_setlen(stu__gc_root_stack, 0);
14154  stua_gc(1);
14155  stb_idict_destroy(stu__globaldict);
14156  stb_sdict_delete(stu__strings);
14157  stb_matcher_free(stu__lex_matcher);
14158  stb_arr_free(stu__gc_ptrlist);
14159  stb_arr_free(func_stack);
14160  stb_arr_free(stu__gc_root_stack);
14161  stu__globaldict = NULL;
14162  }
14163 }
14164 
14165 void stua_run_script(char *s)
14166 {
14167  stua_init();
14168 
14169  stu__curbuf = stu__bufstart = s;
14170  stu__nexttoken();
14171 
14172  stu__flow = FLOW_normal;
14173 
14174  if (!stu__compile_global_scope())
14175  printf("Compile error in line %d: %s\n", stu__comp_err_line, stu__comp_err_str);
14176  stua_gc(1);
14177 }
14178 #endif // STB_DEFINE
14179 
14180 #endif // STB_STUA
14181 
14182 
14183 #undef STB_EXTERN
14184 #endif // STB_INCLUDE_STB_H
